./  ADD  SSI=51300305,NAME=ISTZKFCB
         TITLE 'ISTZKFCB/ACB-VS1/MCB-VS2 - DUMMY MANUAL DIAL PROCESSOR *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
ISTZKFCB CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'ISTZKFCB  75.130'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00010000
*                                                                  0010 00011000
*/* TPZSAVE (7,12,14) BASE AC(KCCB)                                  */ 00012000
*                                                                  0011 00013000
*   DO;                                                            0011 00014000
*     DCL                                                          0012 00015000
*       GPR01F FIXED(31) REG(01);                                  0012 00016000
*     DCL                                                          0013 00017000
*       GPR01P PTR(31) REG(01);                                    0013 00018000
*     DCL                                                          0014 00019000
*       GPR12F FIXED(31) REG(12);                                  0014 00020000
*     DCL                                                          0015 00021000
*       GPR12P PTR(31) REG(12);                                    0015 00022000
*     DCL                                                          0016 00023000
*       GPR13F FIXED(31) REG(13);                                  0016 00024000
*     DCL                                                          0017 00025000
*       GPR13P PTR(31) REG(13);                                    0017 00026000
*     DCL                                                          0018 00027000
*       GPR14F FIXED(31) REG(14);                                  0018 00028000
*     DCL                                                          0019 00029000
*       GPR14P PTR(31) REG(14);                                    0019 00030000
*     RFY                                                          0020 00031000
*      (GPR01P,                                                    0020 00032000
*       GPR12P,                                                    0020 00033000
*       GPR13P,                                                    0020 00034000
*       GPR14P) RSTD;                                              0020 00035000
*     GEN(PRINT OFF);                                              0021 00036000
*                                                                  0021 00037000
         PRINT OFF                                                      00038000
*/* ATBUILD (ISTZSAVE)                                               */ 00039000
*                                                                  0022 00040000
*/* VS1, VS2 TPIOS SAVEAREA FORMAT */                              0022 00041000
*DCL  1  ISTZSAVE BDY(WORD) BASED,                                 0022 00042000
*        2   ZSAZSVBC PTR(31),         /* SAVEAREA BACK CHAIN        */ 00043000
*            3   ZSAZSVMS CHAR(1),     /* MODULE TRACE CODE          */ 00044000
*                4 ZSAZACTV BIT(1),    /* ACTIVE SAVE AREA FLAG      */ 00045000
*        2   ZSAZSVFC PTR(31),         /* SAVEAREA FORWARD CHAIN     */ 00046000
*        2   ZSAZSVRR PTR(31),         /* RETURN REGISTER            */ 00047000
*        2   ZSAZSVVR (6) PTR(31),    /* VARIABLE REGS (7-12) SVEAREA*/ 00048000
*        2   ZSAZTRAC CHAR(4);        /* EBCDIC NAME OF OWNER        */ 00049000
*/*                                                                0023 00050000
*THE FOLLOWING EQUATES SHOULD READ ''FIXED(8) CONSTANT(LENGTH(X))'',    00051000
*WHERE X IS THE NAME OF THE VARIABLE CONTROL BLOCK OR FIELD OF WHICH    00052000
*LENGTH IS THE VALUE BEING EQUATED, SHOULD THE PLS COMPILER BE     0023 00053000
*BE ABLE TO TAKE IT.                                               0023 00054000
*                                                                    */ 00055000
*DCL ZSAZSVVA FIXED(8) CONSTANT(8);  /* DISPLACEMENT TO VARIABLE REGS*/ 00056000
*DCL ZSAZSVSZ FIXED(8) CONSTANT(40); /* LENGTH OF ISTZSAVE           */ 00057000
*                                                                  0025 00058000
*/* END OF ATBUILD                                                   */ 00059000
*                                                                  0025 00060000
*     GEN(PRINT ON);                                               0025 00061000
         PRINT ON                                                       00062000
*     RFY                                                          0026 00063000
*       ISTZSAVE BASED(GPR13P);                                    0026 00064000
*     GEN SETS(ZSAZSVVR)(STM   7,12,ZSAZSVVR+0(13));               0027 00065000
         STM   7,12,ZSAZSVVR+0(13)                                      00066000
*     GEN SETS(GPR12P);                                            0028 00067000
         BALR  GPR12P,0                                                 00068000
@TSTART  DS    0H                                                       00069000
         USING @TSTART,GPR12P                                           00070000
*     GEN(PRINT OFF);                                              0029 00071000
*                                                                  0029 00072000

         L     @09,CRACRR(,@14)                                    0579 00228000
         ST    ATCVTREG,ZCRR2SV(,@09)                              0579 00229000
*       ZCRR13SV=R13;               /* FOR CIDCTL                    */ 00230000
         ST    R13,ZCRR13SV(,@09)                                  0580 00231000
*       R2=DAF;                     /* GET DAF FROM FDB DATA         */ 00232000
         L     @14,FDBDATAA(,FDBREG)                               0581 00233000
         SLR   R2,R2                                               0581 00234000
         ICM   R2,3,DAF(@14)                                       0581 00235000
*       R2=R2&HALFZERO;             /* ZERO OUT TOP HALFWORD         */ 00236000
         N     R2,@CF04705                                         0582 00237000
*       R13=ADDR(CRASVC);           /* SAVE AREA FOR CIDCTL          */ 00238000
         L     @14,RPHCRR(,RPHREG)                                 0583 00239000
         LA    R13,CRASVC(,@14)                                    0583 00240000
*       ZCRCIDSV=R2;                /* SAVE CID FOR REL.     @ZA15137*/ 00241000
*                                                                  0584 00242000
         ST    R2,ZCRCIDSV(,@09)                                   0584 00243000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00244000
*       /*                                                           */ 00245000
*       /* SEGMENT(KFCN010)REQUEST                                   */ 00246000
*       /*                                                           */ 00247000

*                                                                  0585 00249000
*       DO;                                                        0585 00250000
*         GOTO KFCN010;                                            0586 00251000

*KFCN010#:                                                         0587 00253000
*       END;                                                       0587 00254000
KFCN010# DS    0H                                                  0588 00255000
*       R15=4;                      /* SET HALT RETURN CODE          */ 00256000
         LA    R15,4                                               0588 00257000
*       ATCVTREG=ZCRR2SV;           /* RESTORE REGS NEEDED           */ 00258000
         L     @14,RPHCRR(,RPHREG)                                 0589 00259000

*     END;                                                         0591 00264000
*   ELSE                                                           0592 00265000
*     R15=0;                        /* SET CONTINUE RETURN CODE      */ 00266000
         B     @RC00529                                            0592 00267000
@RF00529 SLR   R15,R15                                             0592 00268000
*/* TPZRETN                                                          */ 00269000
*                                                                  0593 00270000
*   DO;                                                            0593 00271000
@RC00529 DS    0H                                                  0594 00272000

*       ;                           /* TPDVTS ISTZFARR               */ 00286000

*/*                      KFCN0010                                    */ 00307000

*/* SEGMENT(KFCN010)START                                            */ 00309000

*KFCN010:                                                          0608 00314000
*   END;                                                           0608 00315000
*                                                                  0608 00316000
KFCN010  DS    0H                                                  0609 00317000
*/********************************************************************/ 00318000
*/*   FIND RDTE FOR DEVICE VIA CIDCTL                                */ 00319000
*/********************************************************************/ 00320000
*                                                                  0609 00321000
*   DO;                             /* CIDCTL(FIND)                  */ 00322000
*     RFY                                                          0610 00323000
*      (EMCR2,                                                     0610 00324000
*       EMCR3) RSTD;                                               0610 00325000
*     GEN SETS(RPHWORK)                                            0611 00326000
*         (STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH);     0611 00327000
         STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH              00328000
*     EMCR3='00'X;                  /* CLEAR EXTRA BITS              */ 00329000
         SLR   EMCR3,EMCR3                                         0612 00330000
*     EMCR3='01'X;                  /* INDICATE SHARED LOCK          */ 00331000
         LA    EMCR3,1                                             0613 00332000
*     CALL ATCLCPTR->ATCCDFND->ISTSDCCF;/* PROCESS REQUEST           */ 00333000
         L     @09,ATCLCPTR                                        0614 00334000
         L     @15,ATCCDFND(,@09)                                  0614 00335000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0614 00336000
*     RFY                                                          0615 00337000
*      (EMCR2,                                                     0615 00338000
*       EMCR3) UNRSTD;                                             0615 00339000
*   END;                            /* CIDCTL                        */ 00340000
*   RFY                                                            0617 00341000
*     R0 RSTD;                                                     0617 00342000
*   IF R15=12                       /* RDTE ONLY WITH NO DAF LOCK    */ 00343000
*     THEN                          /* YES                           */ 00344000
         CH    R15,@CH01353                                        0618 00345000
         BNE   @RF00618                                            0618 00346000
*     RDTREG=R0;                                                   0619 00347000
         LR    RDTREG,R0                                           0619 00348000
*   ELSE                                                           0620 00349000
*     IF R15<4                      /* SUCCESSFUL ?                  */ 00350000
*       THEN                        /* YES                           */ 00351000
         B     @RC00618                                            0620 00352000
@RF00618 CH    R15,@CH00052                                        0620 00353000
         BNL   @RF00620                                            0620 00354000
*       DO;                                                        0621 00355000
*         RDTREG=R0->NCBRDTE;       /* GET ENTRY ADDRESS FROM DNCB 0622 00356000
*                                      RETURNED BY CIDCTL            */ 00357000
         LR    @14,R0                                              0622 00358000
         L     RDTREG,NCBRDTE(,@14)                                0622 00359000
*       END;                                                       0623 00360000
*     ELSE                          /* NO, NON NORMAL RETURN         */ 00361000
*       DO;                                                        0624 00362000
         B     @RC00620                                            0624 00363000

*         FSBMSGID=ZMSG18;          /* PUT MSG ID IN FSB     @XM19753*/ 00365000
         MVC   FSBMSGID(4,FSBREG),@CF01867                         0625 00366000
*         R0=0;                                                    0626 00367000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               0626 00368000
*       END;                                                       0627 00369000
*   IF R0=0                         /* CIDCTL ERROR?                 */ 00370000
*     THEN                                                         0628 00371000

@RC00618 LTR   R0,R0                                               0628 00373000
         BZ    @RT00628                                            0628 00374000
*     ;                             /* YES, EXIT                     */ 00375000
*   ELSE                            /* NO, CONTINUE                  */ 00376000
*KFCN1:                                                            0630 00377000
*     DO;                                                          0630 00378000

*       IF FDBDATCT=2               /* ONLY DAF IN DATA?             */ 00380000
*         THEN                      /* YES                           */ 00381000
         CLC   FDBDATCT(2,FDBREG),@CH00072                         0631 00382000
         BNE   @RF00631                                            0631 00383000
*KFCN2:                                                            0632 00384000
*         DO;                                                      0632 00385000

*           R0=RTRCTDIA;            /* COUNT OF DIAL DIGITS          */ 00387000
         LH    R0,RTRCTDIA(,RDTREG)                                0633 00388000
*           IF R0¬=0                /* ANY DIAL DIGITS ?             */ 00389000
*             THEN                  /* YES                           */ 00390000
         LTR   R0,R0                                               0634 00391000
         BZ    @RF00634                                            0634 00392000
*             DO;                                                  0635 00393000
*                                                                  0635 00394000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00395000
*               /*                                                   */ 00396000
*               /* ************** MOVE DIAL DIGITS TO BTU            */ 00397000
*               /*                                                   */ 00398000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00399000
*                                                                  0636 00400000
*               BTUTEXT(9:R0+8)=RTRDIAA->DIALDIG(1:R0);/*    @XL03HEK*/ 00401000
         LR    @14,R0                                              0636 00402000

*               FDBDATCT=R0;        /* DATA COUNT = DIGIT COUNT      */ 00406000
         STH   R0,FDBDATCT(,FDBREG)                                0637 00407000
*             END;                                                 0638 00408000
*           ELSE                                                   0639 00409000
*             ;                     /* NO DIAL DIGITS                */ 00410000
@RF00634 DS    0H                                                  0640 00411000
*         END KFCN2;                                               0640 00412000

*KFCN3:                                                            0641 00414000
*         DO;                                                      0641 00415000
         B     @RC00631                                            0641 00416000
@RF00631 DS    0H                                                  0641 00417000
KFCN3    DS    0H                                                  0642 00418000
*           DO R0=FDBDATCT BY-1 TO 1;/* MOVE DAF AND DIAL DIGITS OVER   00419000
*                                      6 BYTES                       */ 00420000
         LH    R0,FDBDATCT(,FDBREG)                                0642 00421000

@DL00642 DS    0H                                                  0643 00423000
*             BTUTEXT(R0+6)=BTUTEXT(R0);/* MOVE DATA STARTING AT END    00424000
*                                      OF TEXT 1 BYTE AT A TIME      */ 00425000
         LR    @14,BTUREG                                          0643 00426000

*           FDBDATCT=FDBDATCT-2;    /* REMOVE DAF FROM COUNT         */ 00435000
         LH    @14,FDBDATCT(,FDBREG)                               0645 00436000

         BCTR  @14,0                                               0645 00438000
         STH   @14,FDBDATCT(,FDBREG)                               0645 00439000
*         END KFCN3;                                               0646 00440000

@RC00631 MVC   BTUTEXT(8,BTUREG),RPRNAME(RDTREG)                   0647 00443000
*       FSBMSGID=ZMSG16;            /* MOVE DIAL MSG ID INTO FSB     */ 00444000
*                                                                  0648 00445000
         MVC   FSBMSGID(4,FSBREG),@CF01863                         0648 00446000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00447000
*       /*                                                           */ 00448000
*       /* RELEASE LOCK VIA CIDCTL                                   */ 00449000
*       /*                                                           */ 00450000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00451000
*                                                                  0649 00452000

*         DO;                       /* RELEASE LOCK          @ZA15137*/ 00456000

@RT00562 EQU   ISTA0013                                                 04190000

         END   ISTZKFCN,(C'PLS1612',0701,76350)                         04192000
./  ADD  SSI=81100225,NAME=ISTZLFAB
         TITLE 'ISTZLFAB/AAB-VS1/MAB-VS2 - ABEND SESSION TERMINATOR    *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
ISTZLFAB CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'ISTZLFAB  78.110'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00010000
         EJECT                                                          00011000
*                                                                  0858 00012000
*/********************************************************************/ 00013000
*/*                                                                  */ 00014000
*/*ISTZLFAB: BGNSEGMENT (MAIN,VS1/VS2/SVS).                          */ 00015000
*/*                                                                  */ 00016000
*/*FUNCTION - WHEN A TASK CONNECTED TO A TERMINAL ABENDS AND THE VTAM*/ 00017000
*/*    TERMINATION TASK DOES CLOSE DESTINATION PROCESSING TO         */ 00018000
*/*    DISCONNECT THE SESSION, ISTZLFAB IS GIVEN CONTROL TO INITIATE */ 00019000
*/*    THE I/O (RESET/DISCONNECT FOR FID0 DEVICES - CLEAR/UNBIND FOR */ 00020000
*/*    FID1/FID2 (SNA) DEVICES) AND THEN POST THE VTAM TERMINATION   */ 00021000
*/*    TASK ON THE COMPLETION OF THE I/O.                            */ 00022000
*/*                                                                  */ 00023000
*/*  NOTE - THIS MODULE ALSO GETS CONTROL WHEN A QUIESCE IS ISSUED   */ 00024000
*/*      FOR THE INTELLIGENT CONTROLLER OR AN INOPERATIVE IS RECEIVED*/ 00025000
*/*      FOR AN LU OR A PU SO THAT ISTZLFAB WILL NOT WAIT FOR        */ 00026000
*/*      RESPONSES TO ANY I/O WHICH IT MAY HAVE INITIATED.           */ 00027000
*/*                                                                  */ 00028000
*/*  DO WHILE THERE ARE ELEMENTS FOR ISTZLFAB TO PROCESS.            */ 00029000
*/*                                                                  */ 00030000
*/*    NOTE - THE WORK ELEMENTS FOR ISTZLFAB ARE QUEUED TO A SPECIAL */ 00031000
*/*        PAB IN THE ATCVT (ATCTPSPB) AND MAY BE LCPB(S) FROM CLOSE */ 00032000
*/*        DESTINATION PROCESSING, FSB(S) FROM CHANNEL END OR QUIESCE*/ 00033000
*/*        PROCESSING, OR NCSPL(S) FROM INOPERATIVE PROCESSING-      */ 00034000
*/*        THERE WILL ALWAYS BE AN ELEMENT FOR ISTZLFAB TO PROCESS   */ 00035000
*/*        UPON ENTRY.                                               */ 00036000
*/*                                                                  */ 00037000
*/*    IF THE WORK ELEMENT IS AN LCPB                                */ 00038000
*/*      THEN (PROCESS LCPB)                                         */ 00039000
*/*        CALL CIDRTN TO FIND THE POINTERS TO THE NCB (DNCB OR      */ 00040000
*/*            LUNCB) AND THE FMCB.                                  */ 00041000
*/*                                                                  */ 00042000
*/*        IF AN NCB POINTER WAS FOUND                               */ 00043000
*/*          THEN                                                    */ 00044000
*/*            CALL SUB370X TO CHECK FOR THE DEVICE BEING SICK OR TO */ 00045000
*/*                HANDLE SLOWDOWN CONDITIONS.                       */ 00046000
*/*            NOTE - IF THE SNA DEVICE IS NOT IN SESSION, THE CALL  */ 00047000
*/*                TO SUB370X IS NOT MADE.                           */ 00048000
*/*            IF THE DEVICE IS SICK,THE RECORD MODE DEVICE IS NOT   */ 00049000
*/*                IN SESSION WITH THE ABENDING APPLICATION OR THE   */ 00050000
*/*                BASIC MODE DEVICE'S SESSION HAS ALREADY BEEN      */ 00051000
*/*                PURGED.                                   @ZA29327*/ 00052000
*/*              THEN (DEVICE SICK OR NOT IN SESSION...DO NOT        */ 00053000
*/*                  INITIATE I/O)                                   */ 00054000
*/*                CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE CLOSE      */ 00055000
*/*                    DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS INDICATING THE    */ 00056000
*/*                    SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS.             @AS33958*/ 00057000
*/*              ELSE (DEVICE IS NOT SICK AND IS IN                  */ 00058000
*/*                  SESSION...INITIATE I/O FOR VTAM TERMINATION     */ 00059000
*/*                  TASK)                                           */ 00060000
*/*                CALL BUFFSEG TO DEQUEUE AND FREE THE ELEMENTS ON  */ 00061000
*/*                    THE FMCB AND DNCB TIPS AND OBTAIN A BUFFER IN */ 00062000
*/*                    WHICH TO FORMAT THE I/O REQUEST.              */ 00063000
*/*                CALL PIURTN TO BUILD A PIU FOR THE RESET          */ 00064000
*/*                    (FID0) OR CLEAR (FID1/FID2).                  */ 00065000
*/*                ISSUE TPQUE TO QUEUE THE LCPB TO THE ATCVT WAIT   */ 00066000
*/*                    QUEUE (ATCTPWQA).                             */ 00067000
*/*                CALL ISTZEFBB (EXTERNAL), THE SHIPOUT ROUTINE,    */ 00068000
*/*                    TO INITIATE THE I/O.                          */ 00069000
*/*           NOTE- ISTZEFBA IS CALLED FOR L/3270.                   */ 00070000
*/*            ENDIF (DEVICE SICK OR NOT IN SESSION).                */ 00071000
*/*          ELSE (NO NCB POINTER ).                                 */ 00072000
*/*            CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE CLOSE          */ 00073000
*/*                DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS INDICATING THAT THE   */ 00074000
*/*                SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS.                         */ 00075000
*/*        ENDIF (NCB POINTER FOUND).                                */ 00076000
*/*                                                                  */ 00077000
*/*      ELSE (ELEMENT IS NOT AN LCPB)                               */ 00078000
*/*        IF THE WORK ELEMENT IS A FSB                              */ 00079000
*/*          THEN (PROCESS FSB)                                      */ 00080000
*/*            INSET FSBPROC TO PROCESS THE FSB.                     */ 00081000
*/*                                                                  */ 00082000
*/*          ELSE (NOT A FSB OR LCPB THUS ELEMENT MUST BE A NCSPL)   */ 00083000
*/*            CALL INOPRTN TO FIND THE LCPB ASSOCIATED WITH         */ 00084000
*/*                THE INOPERATIVE BOX FSB AND FREE THE LCPB AND FSB.*/ 00085000
*/*        ENDIF (WORK ELEMENT IS A FSB).                            */ 00086000
*/*    ENDIF (WORK ELEMENT IS AN LCPB).                              */ 00087000
*/*                                                                  */ 00088000
*/*    IF MORE WORK FOR ISTZLFAB TO DO                               */ 00089000
*/*      THEN                                                        */ 00090000
*/*        CALL DEQRTNA TO OBTAIN NEXT WORK ELEMENT.                 */ 00091000
*/*      ELSE                                                        */ 00092000
*/*        INDICATE THAT THERE ARE NO ELEMENTS FOR ISTZLFAB TO       */ 00093000
*/*            PROCESS.                                              */ 00094000
*/*    ENDIF (MORE WORK FOR ISTZLFAB).                               */ 00095000
*/*  ENDDO (WHILE ELEMENTS FOR ISTZLFAB TO PROCESS).                 */ 00096000
*/*                                                                  */ 00097000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(ISTZLFAB).                                             */ 00098000
*/*                                                                  */ 00099000
*/********************************************************************/ 00100000
*/********************************************************************/ 00101000
*/*                                                                  */ 00102000
*/*FSBPROC:BGNSEGMENT(BLOCK).                                        */ 00103000
*/*                                                                  */ 00104000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO PROCESS ANY FSB(S) THAT ARE QUEUED TO THE SPECIAL  */ 00105000
*/*    ABEND 'PAB' IN THE ATCVT.                                     */ 00106000
*/*                                                                  */ 00107000
*/*  IF ELEMENT IS A QUIESCE FSB                                     */ 00108000
*/*    THEN (QUIESCE FSB)                                            */ 00109000
*/*      CALL INOPRTN TO FIND THE LCPB ASSOCIATED WITH THE           */ 00110000
*/*          INOPERATIVE BOX AND, IF FOUND, POST THE LCPB.           */ 00111000
*/*    ELSE (FSB IS IN RESPONSE TO I/O INITIATED BY ISTZLFAB)        */ 00112000
*/*      INCLUDE WAITQSG TO MATCH THE FSB TO THE ASSOCIATED LCPB ON  */ 00113000
*/*          THE WAIT QUEUE.                                         */ 00114000
*/*  ENDIF(ELEMENT IS A QUIESCE FSB).                                */ 00115000
*/*                                                                  */ 00116000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(FSBPROC).                                              */ 00117000
*/********************************************************************/ 00118000
*/* TPZENTER  AC(LCAB)ZCR(ZCRRPTR)SAVES(ZCRSAVNO)                    */ 00119000
*                                                                  0858 00120000
*   DO;                                                            0858 00121000
*                                                                  0858 00122000
*/* ATBUILD (ISTZSAVE,ISTZCRR)                                       */ 00123000
*/* END OF ATBUILD                                                   */ 00124000
*/* ATBUILD (ISTRPH,ISTCRA)                                          */ 00125000
*/* END OF ATBUILD                                                   */ 00126000
*                                                                  0859 00127000
*     RFY                                                          0859 00128000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0859 00129000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0859 00130000
*       GPR02P,                                                    0859 00131000
*       GPR03P,                                                    0859 00132000
*       GPR04P,                                                    0859 00133000
*       GPR05P,                                                    0859 00134000
*       GPR06P,                                                    0859 00135000
*       GPR07P,                                                    0859 00136000
*       GPR12P,                                                    0859 00137000
*       GPR13P,                                                    0859 00138000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              0859 00139000
*     GEN SETS(GPR12P);                                            0860 00140000
*                     /* ESTABLISH BASE */                              00141000
          BALR  GPR12P,0                                                00142000
          USING *,GPR12P                                                00143000
*     DO;                           /* LISATCVT                    0861 00144000
*                                      CVTBASE(PAGEABLE,(GPR02P))    */ 00145000
*       GPR02P=ATCLCPTR;            /* SET UP ATCVT POINTER          */ 00146000
         L     GPR02P,ATCLCPTR                                     0862 00147000
*     END;                          /* LISATCVT                      */ 00148000
*     GPR03P=GPR01P->RPHCRR;        /* ADDRESS CRA                   */ 00149000
         L     GPR03P,RPHCRR(,GPR01P)                              0864 00150000
*     GPR04P=ADDR(GPR03P->CRAPROCR);/* ADDRESS ZCRR                  */ 00151000
         LA    GPR04P,CRAPROCR(,GPR03P)                            0865 00152000
*     GPR06P=GPR04P;                /* INITIALIZE ZCR POINTER        */ 00153000
         LR    GPR06P,GPR04P                                       0866 00154000
*     GPR05P=LENGTH(ISTZCRR);       /* SETUP ZCRR LENGTH             */ 00155000
         LA    GPR05P,536                                          0867 00156000
*     GPR07P=0;                     /* ZERO REG 7                    */ 00157000
         SLR   GPR07P,GPR07P                                       0868 00158000
*     MVCL(GPR04P,GPR06P);          /* CLEAR ZCRR                    */ 00159000
         MVCL  GPR04P,GPR06P                                       0869 00160000
*     GPR04P=ADDR(GPR03P->CRAPROCR);/* ADDRESS ZCRR                  */ 00161000
         LA    GPR04P,CRAPROCR(,GPR03P)                            0870 00162000
*     GPR04P->ZCRFRRA=GPR03P->CRAFRR;/* SAVE CURRENT FRR POINTER     */ 00163000
         L     @14,CRAFRR(,GPR03P)                                 0871 00164000
         ST    @14,ZCRFRRA(,GPR04P)                                0871 00165000
*     GPR03P->CRAFRR=0;             /* CLEAR FRR POINTER             */ 00166000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0872 00167000
         ST    @14,CRAFRR(,GPR03P)                                 0872 00168000
*     GPR04P->ZCRCHAIN=GPR03P->CRACRR;/* SAVE CURRENT CRR            */ 00169000
         L     @11,CRACRR(,GPR03P)                                 0873 00170000
         ST    @11,ZCRCHAIN(,GPR04P)                               0873 00171000
*     GPR03P->CRACRR=GPR04P;        /* SET ZCRR AS CURRENT CRR       */ 00172000
         ST    GPR04P,CRACRR(,GPR03P)                              0874 00173000
*     GPR04P->ZCRID=ZCTYPE;         /* INDICATE CRR AS ZCRR          */ 00174000
         MVI   ZCRID(GPR04P),X'00'                                 0875 00175000
*     GPR04P->ZCRLEN=ZCLNG;         /* SET ZCRR LENGTH               */ 00176000
         MVC   ZCRLEN(2,GPR04P),@CH01547                           0876 00177000
*     GPR04P->ZCRTID=ZCRTLCAB;      /* SET THREAD ID                 */ 00178000
         MVI   ZCRTID(GPR04P),X'13'                                0877 00179000
*     GPR04P->ZCRELCAB='1'B;        /* SET MODULE ENTERED            */ 00180000
         OI    ZCRELCAB(GPR04P),B'00001000'                        0878 00181000
*     GPR04P->ZCRTNAME='LCAB';      /* SET THREAD NAME               */ 00182000
         MVC   ZCRTNAME(4,GPR04P),@CC05359                         0879 00183000
*     GPR05P=ADDR(GPR04P->ZCRSAVEZ);/* ADDR 1ST BUFF                 */ 00184000
         LA    GPR05P,ZCRSAVEZ(,GPR04P)                            0880 00185000

*ISTA0043:                                                         1018 00617000
*             ;                                                    1018 00618000

*             LM(GPR02P,GPR03P,GPR01P->RPHWORK(5:12));             1019 00620000
         LM    GPR02P,GPR03P,RPHWORK+4(GPR01P)                     1019 00621000
*             RFY                                                  1020 00622000

*               GPR14P,                                            1023 00632000
*               GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                    1023 00633000
*           END;                    /* END TPDEQ GENERATION DEQ FSB     00634000
*                                      FORM PAB              @ZA29098*/ 00635000
*           LCPBPTR=0;              /* GET OUT OF LOOP       @ZA29098*/ 00636000
         SLR   LCPBPTR,LCPBPTR                                     1025 00637000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA29098*/ 00638000
*       ELSE                        /*                       @ZA29098*/ 00639000
*         DO;                       /* FSB NOT FOUND         @ZA29098*/ 00640000
         B     @RC00983                                            1027 00641000
@RF00983 DS    0H                                                  1028 00642000
*           BFRPTR=BFRPTR->FSBFSBA& /* GET NEXT WORK ELE     @ZA29098*/ 00643000
*               MASKWRD;            /* ZERO HIGH ORDER BYTE  @ZA29098*/ 00644000

         N     @00,@CF05307                                        1028 00646000

*           LCPBPTR=BFRPTR;         /* SET UP TO CHECK FOR   @ZA29098*/ 00648000
         LR    LCPBPTR,BFRPTR                                      1029 00649000
*         END;                      /* WORK ELEMENT          @ZA29098*/ 00650000
*     END;                          /* END CHECKING FOR FSB  @ZA29098*/ 00651000
@RC00983 DS    0H                                                  1031 00652000
@DE00982 SLR   @15,@15                                             1031 00653000
         CR    LCPBPTR,@15                                         1031 00654000
         BNE   @DL00982                                            1031 00655000
*     IF RPHWEA=0 THEN              /* IF FSB NOT FOUND      @ZA29098*/ 00656000
         C     @15,RPHWEA(,RPHAPTR)                                1032 00657000
         BNE   @RF01032                                            1032 00658000
*       CALL DEQRTNA;               /* DEQ LCPB,IF ANY       @ZA29098*/ 00659000

*   END;                            /* END LOOP.                     */ 00661000

@DE00893 L     @00,RPHWEA(,RPHAPTR)                                1034 00663000
         LTR   @00,@00                                             1034 00664000

*                                                                  1035 00667000

*       GPR15P RSTD;                                               1036 00670000

*                                      ISTZLFAB.                     */ 00694000
         EJECT                                                          00695000
*                                                                  1047 00696000
*/********************************************************************/ 00697000
*/*                                                                  */ 00698000
*/*SUB370X: BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                 */ 00699000
*/*                                                                  */ 00700000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO CHECK                                              */ 00701000
*/*    1) IF THE DEVICE (LU OR PU) IS SICK  OR                       */ 00702000
*/*    IF PURGE HAS ALREADY COMPLETED FOR A BASIC DEVICE.    @ZA29327*/ 00703000
*/*    2) IF ANY COMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER IS SICK OR IN AUTO NETWORK*/ 00704000
*/*    SHUTDOWN                                                      */ 00705000
*/*    3) IF THE NCP IS IN SLOWDOWN MODE AND, IF SO, WAIT UNTIL THE  */ 00706000
*/*    NCP IS OUT OF SLOWDOWN.                                       */ 00707000
*/*                                                                  */ 00708000
*/*  IF THE DEVICE (PU OR LU) IS SICK OR IT'S SESSION HAS ALREADY    */ 00709000
*/*    BEEN PURGED     THEN                                          */ 00710000
*/*      INDICATE THAT ISTZLFAB IS TO QUEUE A FSB FOR THE CLOSE      */ 00711000
*/*          DESTINATION PROCESSING TO INDICATE THE SESSION IS       */ 00712000
*/*          TERMINATED (NO I/O WILL BE INITIATED).          @AS33958*/ 00713000
*/*    ELSE (PU OR LU NOT SICK)                                      */ 00714000
*/*      DO WHILE THERE ARE COMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER(S) IN THE      */ 00715000
*/*          PATH.                                                   */ 00716000
*/*        IF THE COMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER IS SICK OR IN AUTO       */ 00717000
*/*             NETWORK SHUTDOWN                                     */ 00718000
*/*          THEN                                                    */ 00719000
*/*            INDICATE THAT ISTZLFAB IS TO QUEUE A FSB FOR THE      */ 00720000
*/*                CLOSE DESTINATION PROCESSING TO INDICATE THE      */ 00721000
*/*                SESSION IS TERMINATED (NO I/O WILL BE             */ 00722000
*/*                INITIATED).                               @AS33958*/ 00723000
*/*          ELSE (CHECK FOR SLOWDOWN)                               */ 00724000
*/*            IF ANY COMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER IN THE PATH IS IN    */ 00725000
*/*                SLOWDOWN MODE                                     */ 00726000
*/*              THEN                                                */ 00727000
*/*                ISSUE TPQUE TO QUEUE THE ACTIVE RPH TO THE        */ 00728000
*/*                    SLOWDOWN PAB IN THE ICNCB TO WAIT FOR         */ 00729000
*/*                    SLOWDOWN EXIT.                                */ 00730000
*/*                NOTE - THE RPH WILL AGAIN BECOME ACTIVE AFTER     */ 00731000
*/*                    EXIT.                                         */ 00732000
*/*                ISSUE TPWAIT TO WAIT FOR THE TERMINATION OF       */ 00733000
*/*                    SLOWDOWN.                                     */ 00734000
*/*                RESUME PROCESSING WITH THE FIRST COMMUNICATION    */ 00735000
*/*                    CONTROLLER IN THE PATH.                       */ 00736000
*/*            ENDIF (CMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER IN SLOWDOWN MODE).    */ 00737000
*/*        ENDIF (COMMUNICATIONS CONTROLLER IS SICK OR IN SHUTDOWN). */ 00738000
*/*      ENDDO (WHILE THERE ARE COMMUNICATION CONTROLLER(S) IN PATH).*/ 00739000
*/*  ENDIF (DEVICE (PU OR LU) IS SICK).                              */ 00740000
*/*                                                                  */ 00741000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (SUB370X).                                             */ 00742000
*/*                                                                  */ 00743000
*/********************************************************************/ 00744000
*                                                                  1047 00745000
*SUB370X:                                                          1047 00746000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1047 00747000
         B     @PB00002                                            1047 00748000

*               WKREG=0;            /* EXIT LOOP.                    */ 00803000

*   RFY                                                            1118 00958000

*   RFY                                                            1120 00964000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1120 00965000
*   REG14=ZCRSVF2;                  /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS.       */ 00966000
         L     REG14,ZCRSVF2(,ZCRRPTR)                             1121 00967000
*   RFY                                                            1122 00968000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1122 00969000
*   RETURN;                                                        1123 00970000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  1123 00971000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  1123 00972000

*   END SUB370X;                                                   1124 00974000
         EJECT                                                          00975000
*                                                                  1125 00976000
*/********************************************************************/ 00977000
*/*                                                                  */ 00978000
*/*CIDRTN: BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                  */ 00979000
*/*                                                                  */ 00980000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO FIND THE POINTERS TO THE NCB (DNCB OR LUNCB) AND   */ 00981000
*/*    FMCB.                                                         */ 00982000
*/*                                                                  */ 00983000
*/*  ISSUE CIDCTL (FIND) TO FIND THE NCB (DNCB OR LUNCB) AND FMCB.   */ 00984000
*/*                                                                  */ 00985000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (CIDRTN).                                              */ 00986000
*/*                                                                  */ 00987000
*/********************************************************************/ 00988000
*                                                                  1125 00989000
*CIDRTN:                                                           1125 00990000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1125 00991000
CIDRTN   DS    0H                                                  1126 00992000
*   RFY                                                            1126 00993000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1126 00994000
*   ZCRSVF3=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.  @ZA30934*/ 00995000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF3(,ZCRRPTR)                             1127 00996000
*   RFY                                                            1128 00997000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1128 00998000
*   ZCRCIDSV=CIDPARM;               /* SAVE CIDCTL PARAMETER FOR   1129 00999000
*                                      CIDCTL (FINISH).              */ 01000000
         ST    CIDPARM,ZCRCIDSV(,ZCRRPTR)                          1129 01001000
*   DO;                             /* CIDCTL(FIND)                  */ 01002000
*     RFY                                                          1131 01003000
*      (EMCR2,                                                     1131 01004000
*       EMCR3) RSTD;                                               1131 01005000
*     GEN SETS(RPHWORK)                                            1132 01006000
*         (STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH);     1132 01007000
         STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH              01008000
*     EMCR3='00'X;                  /* CLEAR EXTRA BITS              */ 01009000
         SLR   EMCR3,EMCR3                                         1133 01010000
*     EMCR3='01'X;                  /* INDICATE SHARED LOCK          */ 01011000
         LA    EMCR3,1                                             1134 01012000
*     CALL ATCLCPTR->ATCCDFND->ISTSDCCF;/* PROCESS REQUEST           */ 01013000
         L     @14,ATCLCPTR                                        1135 01014000
         L     @15,ATCCDFND(,@14)                                  1135 01015000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1135 01016000
*     RFY                                                          1136 01017000
*      (EMCR2,                                                     1136 01018000
*       EMCR3) UNRSTD;                                             1136 01019000
*   END;                            /* CIDCTL FIND PTRS TO NCB AND 1137 01020000
*                                      FMCB.                         */ 01021000
*   RFY                                                            1138 01022000
*     RCREG RSTD;                                                  1138 01023000
*   IF RCREG=0 THEN                 /* IF PTRS TO THE FMCB AND THE   */ 01024000
         LTR   RCREG,RCREG                                         1139 01025000
         BNZ   @RF01139                                            1139 01026000
*     DO;                           /* NCB ARE FOUND THEN            */ 01027000
*       RFY                                                        1141 01028000
*         REG0 RSTD;                                               1141 01029000
*       NCBPTR=REG0;                /* POINT TO THE DNCB/LUNCB.      */ 01030000
         LR    NCBPTR,REG0                                         1142 01031000
*       RFY                                                        1143 01032000
*         REG0 UNRSTD;                                             1143 01033000
*       FMCBPTR=CIDPARM;            /* POINT TO THE FMCB.            */ 01034000
         LR    FMCBPTR,CIDPARM                                     1144 01035000
*       CIDPARM=ZCRCIDSV;           /* RESTORE CIDCTL PARAMETER FOR     01036000
*                                      CIDCTL FINISH.                */ 01037000
         L     CIDPARM,ZCRCIDSV(,ZCRRPTR)                          1145 01038000
*       DO;                         /* CIDCTL(FINISH)                */ 01039000
*         RFY                                                      1147 01040000
*          (EMCR2,                                                 1147 01041000
*           EMCR3) RSTD;                                           1147 01042000
*         GEN SETS(RPHWORK)                                        1148 01043000
*             (STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH); 1148 01044000
         STM EMCR0,EMCR15,RPHWORK(RPHPTR) SAVE REGS IN RPH              01045000
*         EMCR3='00'X;              /* CLEAR EXTRA BITS              */ 01046000
         SLR   EMCR3,EMCR3                                         1149 01047000
*         CALL ATCLCPTR->ATCCDFIN->ISTSDCCR;/* PROCESS REQUEST       */ 01048000
         L     @14,ATCLCPTR                                        1150 01049000
         L     @15,ATCCDFIN(,@14)                                  1150 01050000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1150 01051000
*         RFY                                                      1151 01052000
*          (EMCR2,                                                 1151 01053000
*           EMCR3) UNRSTD;                                         1151 01054000
*       END;                        /* CIDCTL RELEASE FMCB AND NCB 1152 01055000
*                                      LOCKS.                        */ 01056000
*     END;                          /* END NCB AND FMCB PTRS FOUND.  */ 01057000
*   ELSE                            /* IF PTRS ARE NOT FOUND THEN    */ 01058000
*     NCBPTR=ICNCBPTR;              /* INDICATE NCB NOT FOUND.       */ 01059000
         B     @RC01139                                            1154 01060000
@RF01139 LR    NCBPTR,ICNCBPTR                                     1154 01061000
*   RFY                                                            1155 01062000
*     RCREG UNRSTD;                                                1155 01063000
@RC01139 DS    0H                                                  1156 01064000
*   CIDPARM=ATCLCPTR;               /* RESTORE ATCVT ADDRESS.        */ 01065000
         L     CIDPARM,ATCLCPTR                                    1156 01066000
*   RFY                                                            1157 01067000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1157 01068000
*   REG14=ZCRSVF3;                  /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS@ZA30934*/ 01069000
         L     REG14,ZCRSVF3(,ZCRRPTR)                             1158 01070000
*   RFY                                                            1159 01071000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1159 01072000
*   RETURN;                                                        1160 01073000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  1160 01074000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  1160 01075000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 1160 01076000
*   END CIDRTN;                                                    1161 01077000
@PB00003 DS    0H                                                  1162 01078000
         EJECT                                                          01079000
*                                                                  1162 01080000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01081000
*   /*                                                               */ 01082000
*   /* SEGMENT(BUFFSEG)START                                         */ 01083000
*   /*                                                               */ 01084000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01085000
*                                                                  1162 01086000
*   DO;                                                            1162 01087000
*     GOTO BUFFSEG@;                                               1163 01088000
         B     BUFFSEG@                                            1163 01089000
*BUFFSEG:                                                          1164 01090000
*   END;                                                           1164 01091000
*                                                                  1164 01092000
BUFFSEG  DS    0H                                                  1165 01093000
*/********************************************************************/ 01094000
*/*                                                                  */ 01095000
*/*BUFFSEG:BGNSEGMENT(BLOCK).                                        */ 01096000
*/*                                                                  */ 01097000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO                                                    */ 01098000
*/*    1) CLEAN UP THE FMCB TIP IF REQUIRED                          */ 01099000
*/*    2) CLEAN UP THE LUNCB OR DNCB TIP IF REQUIRED                 */ 01100000
*/*    3) OBTAIN A BUFFER TO BE USED FOR BUILDING A PIU OR A FSB.    */ 01101000
*/*                                                                  */ 01102000
*/*  IF NON-SNA DEVICE                                               */ 01103000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 01104000
*/*      ISSUE TPLOCK TO OBTAIN THE DNCB LOCK.                       */ 01105000
*/*      CLEAR THE SESSION FLAGS IN THE DNCB.                        */ 01106000
*/*  ENDIF (DEVICE IS NON-SNA).                                      */ 01107000
*/*  PUT THE FMCB'S TASK ID INTO THE NCB.                            */ 01108000
*/*  DO WHILE THERE ARE ELEMENTS (FSB(S)) ON THE FMCB                */ 01109000
*/*      TPIOS INBOUND PAB (TIP) OR THE NCB (DNCB OR LUNCB) TIP.     */ 01110000
*/*    CALL DEQRTNA TO DEQUEUE THE FSB                               */ 01111000
*/*        FROM THE TIP.                                             */ 01112000
*/*    CALL RELBUFF TO FREE ALL OF THE FSB(S)                        */ 01113000
*/*        EXCEPT ONE.                                               */ 01114000
*/*    NOTE - IN CLEANING UP THE NCB AND FMCB TIPS, ISTZLFAB WILL    */ 01115000
*/*        SAVE ONE BUFFER IN WHICH IT CAN BUILD A PIU OR A FSB.     */ 01116000
*/*  ENDDO (ELEMENTS ON THE TIPS).                                   */ 01117000
*/*  IF THE DEVICE IS IN SESSION                                     */ 01118000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 01119000
*/*      CLEANUP THE REMAINING FIELDS IN THE DNCB OR LUNCB TIP.      */ 01120000
*/*  ENDIF.                                                          */ 01121000
*/*  IF NO BUFFER WAS FOUND ON ONE OF THE TPIOS INBOUND PABS         */ 01122000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 01123000
*/*      ISSUE REQSTORE (PRIORITY=YES) TO OBTAIN ONE FIXED BUFFER    */ 01124000
*/*          IN WHICH ISTZLFAB CAN BUILD A PIU OR A FSB.             */ 01125000
*/*      NOTE - TPWAIT IS DONE IF REQSTORE CANNOT RETURN A BUFFER.   */ 01126000
*/*  ENDIF (NO BUFFER WAS FOUND).                                    */ 01127000
*/*                                                                  */ 01128000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(BUFFSEG).                                              */ 01129000
*/*                                                                  */ 01130000
*/********************************************************************/ 01131000
*                                                                  1165 01132000
*   IF NCBTYPE=DNTYPE THEN          /* IF NON-SNA DEVICE THEN        */ 01133000
         CLI   NCBTYPE(NCBPTR),X'05'                               1165 01134000

*                                   /* GET A BUFFER.         @AS33958*/ 01352000
*       RFY                                                        1241 01353000
*         RCREG RSTD;                                              1241 01354000
*       IF RCREG>4 THEN             /* IF BUFFER WAS NOT OBTAINED  1242 01355000
*                                      THEN                  @AS33958*/ 01356000
         C     RCREG,@CF00073                                      1242 01357000
         BNH   @RF01242                                            1242 01358000
*/*  TPWAIT                                                          */ 01359000
*                                                                  1243 01360000
*         DO;                       /* BEGIN TPWAIT GENERATION       */ 01361000
*           RFY                                                    1244 01362000
*            (GPR01P,                                              1244 01363000
*             GPR14P,                                              1244 01364000
*             GPR15P) RSTD;                                        1244 01365000
*           RFY                                                    1245 01366000
*            (GPR00P) RSTD;                                        1245 01367000

*           REFS(GPR00P,GPR01P,GPR15P) SETS(RPHWORK);              1246 01369000
         STM   GPR00P,GPR15P,RPHWORK(GPR01P)                            01370000
*           RFY                                                    1247 01371000
*            (GPR00P) UNRSTD;                                      1247 01372000
*           GPR15P=ADDR(LHAA0120);                                 1248 01373000
         LA    GPR15P,LHAA0120                                     1248 01374000
*           GPR14P=0;                                              1249 01375000

*           GPR15P=GPR15P&'00FFFFFF'X;                             1250 01377000
         N     GPR15P,@CF05307                                     1250 01378000

*           CS(GPR14P,GPR15P,GPR01P->RPHRESMA);                    1252 01381000
         CS    GPR14P,@15,RPHRESMA(GPR01P)                         1252 01382000
*           BC(7,LHAB0120);                                        1253 01383000
*                                                                  1253 01384000

*                                                                  1254 01387000

*                                                                  1255 01391000

*             DO;                   /* LISATCVT                    1256 01395000

*               GPR15P=ATCLCPTR;    /* SET UP ATCVT POINTER          */ 01397000
         L     GPR15P,ATCLCPTR                                     1257 01398000
*             END;                  /* LISATCVT                      */ 01399000
*             RESPECIFY                                            1259 01400000

*             GPR00F=0;             /* SET PARAMETER REGISTER TO 0   */ 01402000
         SLR   GPR00F,GPR00F                                       1260 01403000
*             GPR15P=GPR15P->ATCAP31;                              1261 01404000

*             DCL                                                  1262 01406000

*             CALL FMZL0125;                                       1263 01408000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1263 01409000
*             RESPECIFY                                            1264 01410000
*              (GPR00F,                                            1264 01411000
*               GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                    1264 01412000
*           END;                    /* **** END OF TPEXIT            */ 01413000
*LHAB0120:                                                         1266 01414000
*           ;                                                      1266 01415000
LHAB0120 DS    0H                                                  1267 01416000
*           GPR01P->RPHRESMA=0;                                    1267 01417000

*/********************************************************************/ 01460000
*/*                                                                  */ 01461000
*/*RELBUFF:BGNSEGMENT(SUBROUTINE).                                   */ 01462000
*/*                                                                  */ 01463000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO SAVE ONE BUFFER FOR ISTZLFAB'S OWN USE             */ 01464000
*/*    AND FREE ALL OTHERS PASSED TO IT BY BUFFSEG.                  */ 01465000
*/*                                                                  */ 01466000
*/*  IF A BUFFER HAS ALREADY BEEN SAVED FOR ISTZLFAB'S USE           */ 01467000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 01468000
*/*      CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THE CHAIN OF BUFFERS PASSED.@AS33958*/ 01469000
*/*    ELSE                                                          */ 01470000
*/*      SAVE THIS BUFFER FOR ISTZLFAB.                              */ 01471000
*/*      CALL ISTORFID (EXTERNAL) TO ZERO THE TASK ID IN THE BUFFER. */ 01472000
*/*      IF THIS BUFFER HAS ANY OTHER BUFFERS CHAINED OFF OF IT      */ 01473000
*/*        THEN                                                      */ 01474000
*/*          CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THESE CHAINED BUFFERS.  @AS33958*/ 01475000
*/*      ENDIF (BUFFER IS CHAINED).                                  */ 01476000
*/*  ENDIF (A BUFFER HAS ALREADY BEEN SAVED).                        */ 01477000
*/*                                                                  */ 01478000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(RELBUFF).                                              */ 01479000
*/*                                                                  */ 01480000
*/********************************************************************/ 01481000
*                                                                  1281 01482000
*RELBUFF:                                                          1281 01483000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1281 01484000
         B     @PB00004                                            1281 01485000
RELBUFF  DS    0H                                                  1282 01486000
*   RFY                                                            1282 01487000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1282 01488000
*   ZCRSVF2=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 01489000

*   RFY                                                            1284 01491000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1284 01492000

         LTR   BFRPTR,BFRPTR                                       1285 01494000
         BZ    @RF01285                                            1285 01495000
*     DO;                                                          1286 01496000
*       WKREG=RPHWEA-(ADDR(ZIBFSB)-ADDR(ISTZIBUF));/* POINT TO THE 1287 01497000

         BAL   @14,FREERTN                                         1288 01504000
*     END;                          /* END BUFFER ALREADY SAVED.     */ 01505000

*     DO;                           /* MUST SAVE THIS BUFFER FOR I/O.*/ 01507000

*       BFRPTR=RPHWEA;              /* POINT TO THE FSB.             */ 01510000

         ALR   BFRPTR,@00                                          1292 01517000
*       GEN SETS(RPHWORK)(STM   2,10,RPHWORK+4(1));/* SAVE REGISTERS.*/ 01518000
         STM   2,10,RPHWORK+4(1)                                        01519000
*       RFY                                                        1294 01520000
*         REG0 RSTD;                                               1294 01521000
*       RFY                                                        1295 01522000
*         ATCVTREG RSTD;                                           1295 01523000
*       REG0=0;                     /* SET TASK ID TO ZERO.          */ 01524000
         SLR   REG0,REG0                                           1296 01525000
*       ATCVTREG=VTCVTPTR;          /* POINT TO ATCVT.               */ 01526000
         LR    ATCVTREG,VTCVTPTR                                   1297 01527000
*       BFRPARM=BFRPTR;             /* POINT TO THE BUFFER.          */ 01528000
         LR    BFRPARM,BFRPTR                                      1298 01529000
*       CALL ATCVTREG->ATCSMAID;    /* SET THE TASK ID.              */ 01530000
         L     @15,ATCSMAID(,ATCVTREG)                             1299 01531000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1299 01532000
*       GEN REFS(RPHWORK)(LM    2,10,RPHWORK+4(1));/* RESTORE REGS   */ 01533000
         LM    2,10,RPHWORK+4(1)                                        01534000
*       RFY                                                        1301 01535000
*         REG0 UNRSTD;                                             1301 01536000
*       RFY                                                        1302 01537000
*         ATCVTREG UNRSTD;                                         1302 01538000
*       IF ZIBCHAIN¬=0 THEN         /* IF BUFFER(S) CHAINED OFF OF   */ 01539000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             1303 01540000
         L     @14,ZIBCHAIN(,BFRPTR)                               1303 01541000

*         DO;                       /* THIS BUFFER THEN              */ 01544000

*                                      FREED.                @AS33958*/ 01546000

*     END;                                                         1310 01556000
*   RFY                                                            1311 01557000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1311 01558000

*   REG14=ZCRSVF2;                  /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS.       */ 01560000
         L     REG14,ZCRSVF2(,ZCRRPTR)                             1312 01561000
*   RFY                                                            1313 01562000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1313 01563000

@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 1314 01567000
*   END RELBUFF;                                                   1315 01568000
         EJECT                                                          01569000

*/********************************************************************/ 01571000
*/*                                                                  */ 01572000
*/*DEQRTNA:BGNSEGMENT(SUBROUTINE).                                   */ 01573000
*/*                                                                  */ 01574000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO DEQUEUE AN ELEMENT FROM A SPECIFIED PAB.           */ 01575000

*/*ENDSEGMENT(DEQRTNA).                                              */ 01579000
*/*                                                                  */ 01580000
*/********************************************************************/ 01581000
*                                                                  1316 01582000
*DEQRTNA:                                                          1316 01583000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1316 01584000
DEQRTNA  DS    0H                                                  1317 01585000
*   RFY                                                            1317 01586000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1317 01587000
*   ZCRSVF2=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 01588000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF2(,ZCRRPTR)                             1318 01589000
*   RFY                                                            1319 01590000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1319 01591000
*                                                                  1319 01592000

*                                                                  1320 01594000
*   DO;                             /* BEGIN TPDEQ CODE GENERATION   */ 01595000
*     RFY                                                          1321 01596000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1321 01597000
*       GPR01P,                                                    1321 01598000
*       GPR14P,                                                    1321 01599000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              1321 01600000
*     GPR15P=ADDR(WKREG->ISTPAB);   /* ADDRESS QUEUE POINTER         */ 01601000

*FMZL1136:                                                         1327 01613000
*         ;                                                        1327 01614000

         B     @DE01328                                            1328 01617000

*           GPR15P=ADDR(GPR14P->WKECHAIN);                         1329 01619000

*/********************************************************************/ 01665000
*/*                                                                  */ 01666000
*/*PIURTN: BGNSEGMENT(SUBROUTINE).                                   */ 01667000
*/*                                                                  */ 01668000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO FORMAT A PIU FOR A RESET OR DISCONNECT (NON-SNA),  */ 01669000
*/*     OR A CLEAR OR UNBIND  (SNA DEVICES).                         */ 01670000
*/*                                                                  */ 01671000
*/*  IF THE LCCW IS A RESET IMMEDIATE                                */ 01672000
*/*    THEN (FORMAT FID0 PIU)                                        */ 01673000
*/*      IF THE RESET HAS BEEN PROCESSED                             */ 01674000
*/*        THEN                                                      */ 01675000
*/*          FORMAT A DISCONNECT PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.         */ 01676000
*/*        ELSE                                                      */ 01677000
*/*          FORMAT A RESET IMMEDIATE PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.    */ 01678000
*/*      ENDIF (RESET HAS BEEN PROCESSED).                           */ 01679000
*/*    ELSE (NOT RESET IMMEDIATE)                                    */ 01680000
*/*      TURN OFF THE CLEAR AND UNBIND IN PROGRESS FLAGS IN THE      */ 01681000
*/*          FMCB.                                           @AS33958*/ 01682000
*/*      IF THE DEVICE IS FID2                                       */ 01683000
*/*        THEN (FORMAT FID2 PIU)                                    */ 01684000
*/*          IF THE CLEAR HAS BEEN PROCESSED                         */ 01685000
*/*            THEN                                                  */ 01686000
*/*              FORMAT A FID2 UNBIND PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.    */ 01687000
*/*            ELSE                                                  */ 01688000
*/*              FORMAT A FID2 CLEAR PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.     */ 01689000
*/*          ENDIF (CLEAR HAS BEEN PROCESSED).                       */ 01690000
*/*        ELSE (FORMAT FID1 PIU)                                    */ 01691000
*/*          IF THE CLEAR HAS BEEN PROCESSED                         */ 01692000
*/*            THEN                                                  */ 01693000
*/*              FORMAT A FID1 UNBIND PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.    */ 01694000
*/*            ELSE                                                  */ 01695000
*/*              FORMAT A FID1 CLEAR PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.     */ 01696000
*/*          ENDIF (CLEAR HAS BEEN PROCESSED).                       */ 01697000
*/*      ENDIF (FID2 DEVICE).                                        */ 01698000
*/*  ENDIF (RESET IMMEDIATE).                                        */ 01699000
*/*  TURN ON THE TRACE FLAG IF TRACE IS INDICATED IN THE NCB.        */ 01700000
*/*                                                                  */ 01701000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(PIURTN).                                               */ 01702000
*/*                                                                  */ 01703000
*/********************************************************************/ 01704000
*                                                                  1347 01705000
*PIURTN:                                                           1347 01706000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1347 01707000
PIURTN   DS    0H                                                  1348 01708000
*   RFY                                                            1348 01709000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1348 01710000
*   ZCRSVF1=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 01711000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF1(,ZCRRPTR)                             1349 01712000
*   RFY                                                            1350 01713000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1350 01714000
*   ZOBFDB(1:BUFFLNG)=ZOBFDB(1:BUFFLNG)&&ZOBFDB(1:BUFFLNG);/* CLEAR     01715000
*                                      THE BUFFER            @AS33958*/ 01716000
         LH    @15,BUFFLNG                                         1351 01717000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               1351 01718000
         EX    @15,@SX05611                                        1351 01719000
*   IF ICNCBPTR->NCBTYPE=LDTYPE THEN/* IF L/3270             @ZA26631*/ 01720000
*                                                                  1352 01721000

         BNE   @RF01352                                            1352 01723000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01724000
*     /*                                                             */ 01725000
*     /* SEGMENT(LOCLRTN)REQUEST                                     */ 01726000
*     /*                                                             */ 01727000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01728000
*                                                                  1353 01729000
*     DO;                                                          1353 01730000
*       GOTO LOCLRTN;                                              1354 01731000
         B     LOCLRTN                                             1354 01732000
*LOCLRTN#:                                                         1355 01733000
*     END;                          /* BUILD RESET EOC       @ZA26631*/ 01734000
*   ELSE                            /*                       @ZA26631*/ 01735000
*     DO;                           /* IF NOT L/3270         @ZA26631*/ 01736000
         B     @RC01352                                            1356 01737000
@RF01352 DS    0H                                                  1357 01738000
*       IF LCCWOP=LXI THEN          /* IF RESET IMMEDIATE LCCW THEN  */ 01739000
         L     @15,LCPNXLCW(,LCPBPTR)                              1357 01740000
         CLI   LCCWOP(@15),X'2B'                                   1357 01741000
         BNE   @RF01357                                            1357 01742000
*         DO;                                                      1358 01743000
*           FDBDATAA=ADDR(ZOBBTU);  /* INIT FDB DATA ADDRESS.        */ 01744000
         LA    @00,ZOBBTU(,BFRPTR)                                 1359 01745000
         ST    @00,FDBDATAA(,BFRPTR)                               1359 01746000
*           FDBDATCT=LENGTH(ISTBTU);/* INIT FDB DATA COUNT.          */ 01747000
         MVC   FDBDATCT(2,BFRPTR),@CH00166                         1360 01748000
*           BTUFID=FIDRSPNS;        /* INIT TRANSMISSION HEADER.     */ 01749000
         LA    @15,28                                              1361 01750000
         ALR   @15,BFRPTR                                          1361 01751000
         MVC   BTUFID(2,@15),@CB05302                              1361 01752000
*           BTUDEST=LCPDAF;         /* SET DESTINATION FIELD OF CID. */ 01753000
         MVC   BTUDEST(2,@15),LCPDAF(LCPBPTR)                      1362 01754000
*           BTUSORCE=LCPSAF;        /* SET SOURCE FIELD OF CID.      */ 01755000
         MVC   BTUSORCE(2,@15),LCPSAF(LCPBPTR)                     1363 01756000
*           BTUDCF=LENGTH(BTURH)+LENGTH(BTUSYSTR)+LENGTH(BTUEXTR)+ 1364 01757000
*               LENGTH(ISTBDU);     /* SET DATA COUNT FIELD TO 10.   */ 01758000
         MVC   BTUDCF(2,@15),@CH01572                              1364 01759000
*           IF LCPRSTRT=ON THEN     /* IF THE RESET HAS BEEN         */ 01760000
         TM    LCPRSTRT(LCPBPTR),B'00100000'                       1365 01761000
         BNO   @RF01365                                            1365 01762000
*             DO;                   /* PROCESSED THEN                */ 01763000
*               DNCZF001=OFF;       /* CLEAR THE ERROR LOCK.         */ 01764000
         NI    DNCZF001(NCBPTR),B'01111111'                        1367 01765000
*               BDUCOMND=BCMDD;     /* FORMAT A DISCONNECT           */ 01766000
         LA    @15,42                                              1368 01767000

*               BDUMODIF=BMODD;     /* PIU IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.   */ 01770000
         MVI   BDUMODIF(@15),X'00'                                 1369 01771000
*             END;                  /* END RESET HAS BEEN PROCESSED. */ 01772000
*           ELSE                    /* CLEAR HAS NOT BEEN PROCESSED. */ 01773000
*             DO;                                                  1371 01774000
         B     @RC01365                                            1371 01775000
@RF01365 DS    0H                                                  1372 01776000
*               BDUCOMND=BCMDZ;     /* FORMAT A RESET IMMEDIATE PIU  */ 01777000
         LA    @15,42                                              1372 01778000
         ALR   @15,BFRPTR                                          1372 01779000
