*               BDUMODIF=BMODZIM;   /* IN THE OUTBOUND BUFFER.       */ 01781000
         MVI   BDUMODIF(@15),X'44'                                 1373 01782000
*             END;                  /* END RESET NOT PROCESSED.      */ 01783000
*         END;                      /* END FID0 PROCESSING.          */ 01784000
*       ELSE                                                       1376 01785000
*         DO;                       /* MUST BE FID1 OR FID2.         */ 01786000
         B     @RC01357                                            1376 01787000
@RF01357 DS    0H                                                  1377 01788000
*           FMCCIPI=OFF;            /* TURN OFF CLEAR IN PROGRESS  1377 01789000
*                                      FLAG.                 @AS33958*/ 01790000
*           FMCUIPI=OFF;            /* TURN OFF UNBIND IN PROGRESS 1378 01791000
*                                      FLAG.                 @AS33958*/ 01792000
         NI    FMCCIPI(FMCBPTR),B'10011111'                        1378 01793000
*           IF ICNLCLUS¬=ON THEN    /* IF FID1 PROCESSING REQUIRED   */ 01794000
         TM    ICNLCLUS(ICNCBPTR),B'00100000'                      1379 01795000
         BO    @RF01379                                            1379 01796000
*             DO;                   /* THEN                          */ 01797000
*               FDBDATAA=ADDR(ZOBTEXT);/* INIT FDB DATA ADDRESS.     */ 01798000
         LA    @00,ZOBTEXT(,BFRPTR)                                1381 01799000
         ST    @00,FDBDATAA(,BFRPTR)                               1381 01800000
*               FDBDATCT=LENGTH(ISTTH)+LENGTH(ISTRH)+LENGTH(SRUQSREQ);  01801000
         LA    @00,14                                              1382 01802000
         STH   @00,FDBDATCT(,BFRPTR)                               1382 01803000
*                                   /* SET DATA COUNT TO 14.         */ 01804000
*               THFID=THFID1;       /* INDICATE FID1.                */ 01805000
         LA    @15,28                                              1383 01806000
         ALR   @15,BFRPTR                                          1383 01807000
         NI    THFID(@15),B'00011111'                              1383 01808000
         OI    THFID(@15),B'00010000'                              1383 01809000
*               THMPF=THCNOSEG;     /* INDICATE NO SEGMENTING.       */ 01810000
         OI    THMPF(@15),B'00001100'                              1384 01811000
*               THPSI=ON;           /* INDICATE PRIMARY-SECONDARY.   */ 01812000
*               THAFI=ON;           /* TURN ON ASYCH FLOW INDICATOR. */ 01813000
         OI    THPSI(@15),B'00000011'                              1386 01814000
*               THOAF=LCPSAF;       /* SET SOURCE FIELD OF CID.      */ 01815000
         MVC   THOAF(2,@15),LCPSAF(LCPBPTR)                        1387 01816000

         MVC   NIRRH+38(3,BFRPTR),@CB05298                         1389 01820000

*                                      COUNT TO 4                    */ 01822000
         LA    @14,4                                               1390 01823000

         LA    @11,1                                               1396 01839000
         ALR   @00,@11                                             1396 01840000
         STH   @00,FDBDATCT(,BFRPTR)                               1396 01841000
*                   THDCF=THDCF+LENGTH(SRUTYPE);/* INCREMENT DATA  1397 01842000
*                                      COUNT FIELD BY ONE.           */ 01843000

         OI    FMCUIPI(FMCBPTR),B'00100000'                        1398 01847000
*                 END;              /* END CLEAR HAS BEEN PROCESSED. */ 01848000
*               ELSE                /* IF CLEAR NOT PROCESSED THEN   */ 01849000
*                 FMCCIPI=ON;       /* INDICATE CLEAR IN PROGRESS.   */ 01850000
         B     @RC01392                                            1400 01851000
@RF01392 OI    FMCCIPI(FMCBPTR),B'01000000'                        1400 01852000
*             END;                  /* END FID1 PROCESSING.          */ 01853000

         ST    @00,FDBDATAA(,BFRPTR)                               1403 01860000
*               FDBDATCT=LENGTH(ISTTH2)+LENGTH(ISTLH)+LENGTH(ISTRH)+    01861000

         LA    @15,32                                              1405 01868000

         NI    TH2FID(@15),B'00101111'                             1405 01870000
         OI    TH2FID(@15),B'00100000'                             1405 01871000
*               TH2PSI=ON;          /* INDICATE PRIMARY-SECONDARY.   */ 01872000
*               TH2AFI=ON;          /* INDICATE ASYNCH FLOW.         */ 01873000
         OI    TH2PSI(@15),B'00000011'                             1407 01874000
*               TH2MPF=MAPVAL;      /* INDICATE RH INCLUDED AND RU IS   01875000
*                                      COMPLETE.                     */ 01876000
         OI    TH2MPF(@15),B'00001100'                             1408 01877000
*               TH2PYF=THCNOPYF;    /* INDICATE NO PRIORITY.         */ 01878000
         NI    TH2PYF(@15),B'00001111'                             1409 01879000
*               TH2SEF=THCNOSEF;    /* INDICATE NO SECURITY.         */ 01880000
         NI    TH2SEF(@15),B'11110011'                             1410 01881000
*               TH2CDF=THCNOCDF;    /* INDICATE NO CODE DEFINITION.  */ 01882000
         NI    TH2CDF(@15),B'11111100'                             1411 01883000
*               TH2DAF=(NCBPTR->NCBDAF)-(ICNCBPTR->NCBNCBA);/* SET 1412 01884000
*                                      LOCAL DESTINATION FIELD OF  1412 01885000
*                                      CID.                          */ 01886000
         LH    @14,NCBDAF(,NCBPTR)                                 1412 01887000
         N     @14,@CF05621                                        1412 01888000
         LH    @11,NCBNCBA(,ICNCBPTR)                              1412 01889000

*               TH2OAF=FMCSAF-ATCVTMID;/* SET LOCAL SOURCE FIELD OF     01893000
*                                      CID.                          */ 01894000
         LH    @14,FMCSAF(,FMCBPTR)                                1413 01895000
         N     @14,@CF05621                                        1413 01896000
         LH    @11,ATCVTMID(,VTCVTPTR)                             1413 01897000
         N     @11,@CF05621                                        1413 01898000
         SLR   @14,@11                                             1413 01899000
         STC   @14,TH2OAF(,@15)                                    1413 01900000
*               LHLEN=FDBDATCT;     /* SET LOCAL HEADER LENGTH.      */ 01901000
         LA    @15,28                                              1414 01902000
         ALR   @15,BFRPTR                                          1414 01903000
         STH   @00,LHLEN(,@15)                                     1414 01904000
*               NIRRH=CLRRH;        /* SET REQ HEADER FOR CLEAR.     */ 01905000
         MVC   NIRRH+38(3,BFRPTR),@CB05298                         1415 01906000
*               SRUQSREQ=SRCLEAR;   /* INDICATE CLEAR PIU.           */ 01907000
         LA    @14,41                                              1416 01908000
         ALR   @14,BFRPTR                                          1416 01909000
         MVI   SRUQSREQ(@14),X'A1'                                 1416 01910000
*               IF LCPRSTRT=ON THEN /* IF CLEAR HAS ALREADY BEEN     */ 01911000
         TM    LCPRSTRT(LCPBPTR),B'00100000'                       1417 01912000
         BNO   @RF01417                                            1417 01913000
*                 DO;               /* PROCESSED THEN                */ 01914000
*                   SRUQSREQ=SRUNBIND;/* FORMAT UNBIND PIU.          */ 01915000
         MVI   SRUQSREQ(@14),X'32'                                 1419 01916000
*                   UNBTYPE=SRUNORM;/* INDICATE NORM END OF SESSION. */ 01917000
         MVI   UNBTYPE(@14),X'01'                                  1420 01918000
*                   FMCUIPI=ON;     /* INDICATE UNBIND IN PROGRESS.  */ 01919000
         OI    FMCUIPI(FMCBPTR),B'00100000'                        1421 01920000
*                   FDBDATCT=FDBDATCT+LENGTH(SRUTYPE);/* INCREMENT 1422 01921000
*                                      DATA COUNT BY ONE FOR UNBIND     01922000
*                                      (RU IS TWO BYTES)     @ZA16215*/ 01923000
         AL    @00,@CF00035                                        1422 01924000
         STH   @00,FDBDATCT(,BFRPTR)                               1422 01925000
*                   LHLEN=FDBDATCT; /* CORRECT LH LENGTH     @ZA16215*/ 01926000
         STH   @00,LHLEN(,@15)                                     1423 01927000
*                 END;              /* END CLEAR ALREADY PROCESSED.  */ 01928000
*               ELSE                /* FORMAT CLEAR PIU.             */ 01929000
*                 FMCCIPI=ON;       /* INDICATE CLEAR IN PROGRESS.   */ 01930000
         B     @RC01417                                            1425 01931000
@RF01417 OI    FMCCIPI(FMCBPTR),B'01000000'                        1425 01932000
*             END;                  /* END FID2 PROCESSING.          */ 01933000
@RC01417 DS    0H                                                  1427 01934000
*         END;                      /* END FID1/FID2 PROCESSING.   1427 01935000
*                                                            @AS33958*/ 01936000
@RC01379 DS    0H                                                  1428 01937000
*       LCPRSTRT=OFF;               /* SET OFF PARTIALLY PROC FLAG.  */ 01938000
@RC01357 NI    LCPRSTRT(LCPBPTR),B'11011111'                       1428 01939000
*       IF NCBFTRIO=ON THEN         /* IF I/O TRACE IS REQUIRED THEN */ 01940000
         CLI   NCBFTRIO(NCBPTR),1                                  1429 01941000
         BNE   @RF01429                                            1429 01942000
*         ZOBRT08=ON;               /* INDICATE IN THE OUTBOUND    1430 01943000
*                                      BUFFER TRACE IS REQUIRED.     */ 01944000
         OI    ZOBRT08(BFRPTR),B'01000000'                         1430 01945000
*       ELSE                                                       1431 01946000
*         ;                         /* NO I/O TRACE REQUIRED.@AS33958*/ 01947000
@RF01429 DS    0H                                                  1432 01948000
*     END;                          /* END NOT L/3270        @ZA26631*/ 01949000
*   ZCRTSW2=ON;                     /* INDICATE BUFFER USED. @AS33958*/ 01950000
@RC01352 OI    ZCRTSW2(ZCRRPTR),B'01000000'                        1433 01951000
*   RFY                                                            1434 01952000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1434 01953000
*   REG14=ZCRSVF1;                  /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS.       */ 01954000
         L     REG14,ZCRSVF1(,ZCRRPTR)                             1435 01955000
*   RFY                                                            1436 01956000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1436 01957000
*   RETURN;                                                        1437 01958000
@EL00006 DS    0H                                                  1437 01959000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  1437 01960000
@ER00006 BR    @14                                                 1437 01961000
*   END PIURTN;                                                    1438 01962000
@PB00006 DS    0H                                                  1439 01963000
         EJECT                                                          01964000
*                                                                  1439 01965000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01966000
*   /*                                                               */ 01967000
*   /* SEGMENT(WAITQSG)START                                         */ 01968000
*   /*                                                               */ 01969000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01970000
*                                                                  1439 01971000
*   DO;                                                            1439 01972000
*     GOTO WAITQSG@;                                               1440 01973000
         B     WAITQSG@                                            1440 01974000
*WAITQSG:                                                          1441 01975000
*   END;                                                           1441 01976000
*                                                                  1441 01977000
WAITQSG  DS    0H                                                  1442 01978000
*/********************************************************************/ 01979000
*/*                                                                  */ 01980000
*/*WAITQSG:BGNSEGMENT (BLOCK).                                       */ 01981000
*/*                                                                  */ 01982000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO                                                    */ 01983000
*/*    1) MATCH THE FSB RECEIVED BY ISTZLFAB TO THE LCPB(S) ON THE   */ 01984000
*/*    WAIT QUEUE IN THE ATCVT                                       */ 01985000
*/*    2) CALL PIURTN TO PROCESS AN UNBIND OR A DISCONNECT IF A      */ 01986000
*/*    CLEAR OR A RESET HAS BEEN PROCESSED                           */ 01987000
*/*    3) CALL TPQUE ROUTINE WHEN TERMINATION PROCESSING IS COMPLETE */ 01988000
*/*    4) FREE ALL LCPB(S) SUBJECT OR RECURSION.                     */ 01989000
*/*                                                                  */ 01990000
*/*  DO WHILE THERE ARE LCPB(S) ON THE WAIT QUEUE IN THE ATCVT.      */ 01991000
*/*    IF THE LCPB IS SUBJECT TO RECURSION (THE LCPB ORIGINATED FROM */ 01992000
*/*        A TERMINATION TASK WHICH HAS ABENDED)                     */ 01993000
*/*      THEN                                                        */ 01994000
*/*        CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE WAIT QUEUE.      */ 01995000
*/*        CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THE LCPB.                         */ 01996000
*/*      ELSE (NOT RECURSIVE LCPB)                                   */ 01997000
*/*        IF THE LCPB IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE FSB (THE COMMUNICATION */ 01998000
*/*            ID(S) MATCH)                                          */ 01999000
*/*          THEN                                                    */ 02000000
*/*            TURN OFF THE CLEAR AND UNBIND IN PROGRESS FLAGS IN    */ 02001000
*/*                THE FMCB.                                         */ 02002000
*/*            IF NCB AVAILABLE AND A CLEAR COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY   */ 02003000
*/*                OR A RESET IMMEDIATE HAS BEEN PROCESSED           */ 02004000
*/*              THEN (CLEAR OR RESET IMMEDIATE COMPLETED)           */ 02005000
*/*                CALL SUB370X TO CHECK FOR THE PATH BEING SICK OR  */ 02006000
*/*                    TO HANDLE SLOWDOWN CONDITIONS.                */ 02007000
*/*                IF THE PATH IS SICK                               */ 02008000
*/*                  THEN (PATH SICK...DO NOT INITIATE FURTHER I/O)  */ 02009000
*/*                    CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE WAIT */ 02010000
*/*                        QUEUE.                                    */ 02011000
*/*                    CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE CLOSE  */ 02012000
*/*                        DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS INDICATING    */ 02013000
*/*                        THAT THE SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS (NO     */ 02014000
*/*                        FURTHER I/O WILL BE DONE BY               */ 02015000
*/*                        ISTZLFAB).                        @AS33958*/ 02016000
*/*                  ELSE (PATH NOT SICK...INITIATE I/O)             */ 02017000
*/*                    CALL PIURTN TO BUILD A PIU FOR THE DISCONNECT */ 02018000
*/*                        (FID0) OR THE UNBIND (FID1/FID2).         */ 02019000
*/*                    CALL ISTZEFBB (EXTERNAL), THE SHIPOUT         */ 02020000
*/*                        ROUTINE, TO INITIATE THE I/O).            */ 02021000
*/*                ENDIF (THE PATH IS SICK).                         */ 02022000
*/*                                                                  */ 02023000
*/*              ELSE (UNBIND, DISCONNECT, OR RESET ERROR LOCK       */ 02024000
*/*                  COMPLETED OR NO NCB)                            */ 02025000
*/*                IF DISCONNECT WAS DONE BUT IT WAS NOT SUCCESSFUL  */ 02026000
*/*                  THEN (UNSUCCESSFUL DISCONNECT)                  */ 02027000
*/*                    CALL SUB370X TO CHECK FOR THE PATH BEING SICK */ 02028000
*/*                        OR TO HANDLE SLOWDOWN CONDITIONS.         */ 02029000
*/*                    IF THE PATH IS SICK                           */ 02030000
*/*                      THEN (PATH SICK...DO NOT INITIATE FURTHER   */ 02031000
*/*                          I/O)                                    */ 02032000
*/*                        CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE  */ 02033000
*/*                            WAIT QUEUE.                           */ 02034000
*/*                        CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE    */ 02035000
*/*                            CLOSE DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS     */ 02036000
*/*                            INDICATING THAT THE SESSION NO LONGER */ 02037000
*/*                            EXISTS (NO FURTHER I/O WILL BE DONE   */ 02038000
*/*                            BY ISTZLFAB).                 @AS33958*/ 02039000
*/*                      ELSE (PATH NOT SICK...INITIATE I/O)         */ 02040000
*/*                        CALL PIURTN TO BUILD A PIU FOR A RESET.   */ 02041000
*/*                        MAKE THE PIU A RESET ERROR LOCK PIU.      */ 02042000
*/*                        CALL ISTZEFBB (EXTERNAL), THE SHIPOUT     */ 02043000
*/*                            ROUTINE, TO INITIATE THE I/O.         */ 02044000
*/*                    ENDIF (THE PATH IS SICK).                     */ 02045000
*/*                  ELSE (NOT AN UNSUCCESSFUL DISCONNECT...ALL I/O  */ 02046000
*/*                      IS COMPLETE)                                */ 02047000
*/*                    CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE WAIT */ 02048000
*/*                        QUEUE.                                    */ 02049000
*/*                    IF THE NCB IS AVAILABLE                       */ 02050000
*/*                      THEN                                        */ 02051000
*/*                        RESTORE NCB TASK ID (PST POINTER).        */ 02052000
*/*                    ENDIF (NCB AVAILABLE).                        */ 02053000
*/*                    CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE CLOSE  */ 02054000
*/*                        DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS INDICATING    */ 02055000
*/*                        THAT THE SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS.        */ 02056000
*/*                    RESTORE THE NCB TASK ID.              @AS33958*/ 02057000
*/*                ENDIF (UNSUCCESSFUL DISCONNECT).                  */ 02058000
*/*            ENDIF (CLEAR OR RESET IMMEDIATE PROCESSED).           */ 02059000
*/*            INDICATE THAT THERE ARE NO MORE LCPB(S) TO PROCESS.   */ 02060000
*/*          ELSE (THE LCPB IS NOT ASSOCIATED WITH THE FSB)          */ 02061000
*/*            POINT TO THE NEXT LCPB ON THE WAIT QUEUE IF THERE IS  */ 02062000
*/*                ONE.                                              */ 02063000
*/*        ENDIF (THE LCPB IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE FSB).              */ 02064000
*/*    ENDIF (THE LCPB IS RECURSIVE).                                */ 02065000
*/*  ENDDO (WHILE THERE ARE LCPB(S) ON THE WAIT QUEUE).              */ 02066000
*/* IF THE BUFFER CONTAINING THE FSB WAS NOT QUEUED FOR CLOSE        */ 02067000
*/*     DESTINATION PROCESSING OR USED FOR I/O                       */ 02068000
*/*   THEN                                                   @AS33958*/ 02069000
*/*     CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THE FSB.                     @AS33958*/ 02070000
*/* ENDIF.                                                   @AS33958*/ 02071000
*/*                                                                  */ 02072000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(WAITQSG).                                              */ 02073000
*/*                                                                  */ 02074000
*/********************************************************************/ 02075000
*                                                                  1442 02076000
*   LCPBPTR=ATCTPWQA;               /* POINT TO FIRST LCPB ON THE  1442 02077000
*                                      WAIT QUEUE.                   */ 02078000
         L     LCPBPTR,ATCTPWQA(,VTCVTPTR)                         1442 02079000
*   ZCRTSW2=OFF;                    /* INITIALIZE SWITCH TO INDICATE    02080000
*                                      THAT THE BUFFER CONTAINING THE   02081000
*                                      FSB HAS NOT BEEN REUSED AND 1443 02082000
*                                      CAN THEREFORE BE FREED.     1443 02083000
*                                                            @AS33958*/ 02084000
         NI    ZCRTSW2(ZCRRPTR),B'10111111'                        1443 02085000
*   DO WHILE((LCPBPTR&MASK)¬=0);    /* LOOP THROUGH THE LCPB LOOKING    02086000
*                                      FOR A MATCH/LDNCB     @ZA26631*/ 02087000
         B     @DE01444                                            1444 02088000
@DL01444 DS    0H                                                  1445 02089000
*     ICNCBPTR=LCCWDATA;            /* INIT PTR TO ICNCB FROM LCPB.  */ 02090000
         L     @15,LCPNXLCW(,LCPBPTR)                              1445 02091000
         L     ICNCBPTR,LCCWDATA(,@15)                             1445 02092000
*     IF LCPZRT00=ON THEN           /* IF THE LCPB IS RECURSIVE THEN */ 02093000
         TM    LCPZRT00(LCPBPTR),B'10000000'                       1446 02094000
         BNO   @RF01446                                            1446 02095000
*       DO;                                                        1447 02096000
*         CALL DEQRTN;              /* DEQUEUE THE LCPB.             */ 02097000
         BAL   @14,DEQRTN                                          1448 02098000
*         WKREG=LCPBPTR;            /* POINT TO THE LCPB.            */ 02099000
         LR    WKREG,LCPBPTR                                       1449 02100000
*         CALL FREERTN;             /* FREE THE LCPB.                */ 02101000
         BAL   @14,FREERTN                                         1450 02102000
*         LCPBPTR=ATCTPWQA;         /* POINT TO NEXT LCPB ON WAIT  1451 02103000
*                                      QUEUE.                        */ 02104000
         L     LCPBPTR,ATCTPWQA(,VTCVTPTR)                         1451 02105000
*         RFY                                                      1452 02106000
*           ISTPIU BASED(ADDR(ZIBBTU));/*                            */ 02107000
*       END;                        /* END LCPB RECURSIVE.           */ 02108000
*     ELSE                          /* IF LCPB NOT RECURSIVE THEN    */ 02109000
*       IF FSBCID=LCPCID THEN       /* IF FSB MATCHES THE LCPB       */ 02110000
         B     @RC01446                                            1454 02111000

         BNE   @RF01462                                            1462 02152000
@RT01462 DS    0H                                                  1463 02153000
*               DO;                 /* THEN                  @AS33958*/ 02154000
*                 IF ICNCBPTR¬=NCBPTR&/* IF DNCB/LUNCB IS AVAILABLE     02155000
*                                      AND                           */ 02156000
*                     LCPRSTRT=ON&  /* IT IS A CLEAR OR A RESET AND  */ 02157000
*                     (LCCWOP¬=LCLEAR|RHSENSE=OFF) THEN/* NO ERROR ON   02158000

*                   DO;             /* THEN                          */ 02170000
*                     RFY                                          1466 02171000

*                     IF ZCRTSW1=ON THEN/* IF FSB TO BE QUEUED     1468 02175000

@RF01468 DS    0H                                                  1474 02189000
*                         CALL PIURTN;/* BUILD UNBIND/DISCONNECT PIU.*/ 02190000

         L     @15,ZFSZEFBB(,@14)                                  1475 02194000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1475 02195000
*                       END;        /* END DEVICE NOT SICK.          */ 02196000
*                   END;            /* END CLEAR OR RESET PROCESSED. */ 02197000
*                 ELSE              /* DISCONNECT, UNBIND, OR RESET  */ 02198000
*                   DO;             /* ERROR LOCK PROCESSED.         */ 02199000
         B     @RC01464                                            1478 02200000
@RF01464 DS    0H                                                  1479 02201000
*                     IF NCBTYPE=DNTYPE&/* IF A DISCONNECT WAS       */ 02202000

*                         FSBSERR=ON THEN/* BUT WAS NOT SUCCESSFUL   */ 02204000

         TM    FSBSERR+16(BFRPTR),B'10000000'                      1479 02209000
         BNO   @RF01479                                            1479 02210000
*                       DO;         /* THEN                          */ 02211000
*                         CALL SUB370X;/* CHECK FOR SICK/SHUTDOWN  1481 02212000
*                                                              STATE.*/ 02213000
         BAL   @14,SUB370X                                         1481 02214000
*                         IF ZCRTSW1=ON THEN/* IF FSB IS NOT TO BE 1482 02215000
*                                      QUEUED                        */ 02216000
         TM    ZCRTSW1(ZCRRPTR),B'10000000'                        1482 02217000
         BNO   @RF01482                                            1482 02218000
*                           DO;     /* (DEVICE IS SICK) THEN         */ 02219000
*                             CALL DEQRTN;/* DEQUEUE THE LCPB.       */ 02220000
         BAL   @14,DEQRTN                                          1484 02221000
*                             CALL TPQUERTN;/* QUEUE THE FSB FOR   1485 02222000
*                                      CLSDST.               @AS33958*/ 02223000
         BAL   @14,TPQUERTN                                        1485 02224000
*                           END;    /* END FSB NOT TO BE QUEUED.     */ 02225000
*                         ELSE      /* DEVICE NOT SICK THEREFORE     */ 02226000
*                           DO;     /* INITIATE I/O.                 */ 02227000
         B     @RC01482                                            1487 02228000
@RF01482 DS    0H                                                  1488 02229000
*                             CALL PIURTN;/* BUILD RESET PIU.        */ 02230000
         BAL   @14,PIURTN                                          1488 02231000
*                             BDUMODIF=BMODZEM;/* MAKE PIU RESET   1489 02232000
*                                      ERROR LCK.                    */ 02233000
         MVI   BDUMODIF+42(BFRPTR),X'41'                           1489 02234000
*                             CALL ISTZEFBB;/* SHIPOUT THE PIU.      */ 02235000
         L     @14,ATCZFSVT(,VTCVTPTR)                             1490 02236000
         L     @15,ZFSZEFBB(,@14)                                  1490 02237000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1490 02238000
*                             DNCZF001=ON;/* INDICATE RESET ERROR  1491 02239000
*                                      LOCK IS SENT.                 */ 02240000
         OI    DNCZF001(NCBPTR),B'10000000'                        1491 02241000
*                           END;    /* END DEVICE NOT SICK.          */ 02242000
*                       END;        /* END UNSUCCESSFUL DISCONNECT.  */ 02243000
*                     ELSE                                         1494 02244000
*                       DO;         /* TERMINATION COMPLETE.         */ 02245000
         B     @RC01479                                            1494 02246000
@RF01479 DS    0H                                                  1495 02247000
*                         CALL DEQRTN;/* DEQUEUE LCPB.               */ 02248000
         BAL   @14,DEQRTN                                          1495 02249000
*                         NCBTSKID=LCPFLCCW;/* RESTORE THE NCB TASK     02250000
*                                      ID.                   @AS33958*/ 02251000
         L     @00,LCPFLCCW(,LCPBPTR)                              1496 02252000
         ST    @00,NCBTSKID(,NCBPTR)                               1496 02253000
*                         CALL TPQUERTN;/* QUEUE THE FSB FOR CLSDST. */ 02254000
         BAL   @14,TPQUERTN                                        1497 02255000
*                       END;        /* END TERMINATION COMPLETE.     */ 02256000
*                   END;            /* END DISCONNECT, UNBIND, OR  1499 02257000
*                                      RESET ERROR LOCK COMPLETED.   */ 02258000
@RC01479 DS    0H                                                  1500 02259000
*               END;                /* END FSB MATCH FOR     @ZA26631   02260000
*                                      NOT L/3270            @ZA26631*/ 02261000
@RC01464 DS    0H                                                  1501 02262000
*           LCPBPTR=0;              /* EXIT THE LOOP.                */ 02263000
@RF01462 DS    0H                                                  1501 02264000
@RC01456 SLR   LCPBPTR,LCPBPTR                                     1501 02265000
*         END;                      /* END LCPB-FSB MATCH FOUND.     */ 02266000
*       ELSE                        /* LCPB DOES NOT MATCH THE FSB.  */ 02267000
*         LCPBPTR=LCPCHAIN;         /* PTR TO NEXT LCPB ON THE WAIT     02268000
*                                      QUEUE.                        */ 02269000
         B     @RC01454                                            1503 02270000
@RF01454 L     LCPBPTR,LCPCHAIN(,LCPBPTR)                          1503 02271000
*   END;                            /* END LOOP FOR LCPB-FSB MATCH.  */ 02272000
@RC01454 DS    0H                                                  1504 02273000
@RC01446 DS    0H                                                  1504 02274000
@DE01444 LR    @00,LCPBPTR                                         1504 02275000
         N     @00,@CF01714                                        1504 02276000
         LTR   @00,@00                                             1504 02277000
         BNZ   @DL01444                                            1504 02278000
*   IF ZCRTSW2=OFF THEN             /* IF THE FSB HAS NOT BEEN QUEUED   02279000
*                                      FOR CLSDST OR USED FOR I/O  1505 02280000
*                                      THEN                  @AS33958*/ 02281000
         TM    ZCRTSW2(ZCRRPTR),B'01000000'                        1505 02282000
         BNZ   @RF01505                                            1505 02283000
*     DO;                           /*                       @AS33958*/ 02284000
*       WKREG=BFRPTR;               /* POINT TO FSB TO BE FREED    1507 02285000
*                                                            @AS33958*/ 02286000
         LR    WKREG,BFRPTR                                        1507 02287000
*       CALL FREERTN;               /* FREE THE BUFFER.      @AS33958*/ 02288000
         BAL   @14,FREERTN                                         1508 02289000
*     END;                          /* END FREE FSB.         @AS33958*/ 02290000
*   ELSE                                                           1510 02291000
*     ;                             /* FSB STILL IN USE.     @AS33958*/ 02292000
*                                                                  1510 02293000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 02295000
*   /*                                                               */ 02296000
*   /* SEGMENT(WAITQSG)FINISH                                        */ 02297000
*   /*                                                               */ 02298000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02299000
*                                                                  1511 02300000
*   DO;                                                            1511 02301000
*     GOTO WAITQSG#;                                               1512 02302000
         B     WAITQSG#                                            1512 02303000
*WAITQSG@:                                                         1513 02304000
*   END;                                                           1513 02305000
         EJECT                                                          02306000
*                                                                  1514 02307000
*/********************************************************************/ 02308000
*/*                                                                  */ 02309000
*/*INOPRTN: BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                 */ 02310000
*/*                                                                  */ 02311000
*/*FUNCTION IS                                                       */ 02312000
*/*    1) FOR QUIESCE FSB(S), POST THE ASSOCIATED LCPB, IF ANY, AND  */ 02313000
*/*    FREE THE FSB.                                                 */ 02314000
*/*    2) FOR NCSPL(S), POST THE ASSOCIATED LCPB AND POST VARY'S RPH */ 02315000
*/*    (IN NCSPL)                                                    */ 02316000
*/*    3) CHECK FOR RECURSIVE LCPB(S) (LCPB(S) ORIGINATING FROM A    */ 02317000
*/*    TERMINATION TASK WHICH HAS ABENDED) AND FREE THEM.            */ 02318000
*/*  DO WHILE THERE ARE LCPB(S) ON THE WAIT QUEUE IN THE ATCVT.      */ 02319000
*/*    IF THE LCPB IS RECURSIVE                                      */ 02320000
*/*      THEN                                                        */ 02321000
*/*        CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE WAIT QUEUE.      */ 02322000
*/*        CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THE LCPB.                         */ 02323000
*/*      ELSE                                                        */ 02324000
*/*        IF THE LCPB IS ASSOCIATED WITH THE QUIESCE FSB OR THE     */ 02325000
*/*            NCSPL                                                 */ 02326000
*/*          THEN                                                    */ 02327000
*/*            NOTE - FOR THE QUIESCE FSB, THE LCPB IS ASSOCIATED    */ 02328000
*/*                IF THE ICNCB POINTER IN THE FSB MATCHES THE       */ 02329000
*/*                POINTER TO THE ICNCB (LOCAL ICNCB)                */ 02330000
*/*                IN THE LCPB --------- FOR THE NCSPL, THE LCPB     */ 02331000
*/*                IS ASSOCIATED IF ITS COMMUNICATIONS ID (CID)      */ 02332000
*/*                MATCHES THE CID IN THE NCSPL.                     */ 02333000
*/*            CALL DEQRTN TO DEQUEUE THE LCPB FROM THE WAIT QUEUE.  */ 02334000
*/*            CALL TPQUERTN TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR THE CLOSE          */ 02335000
*/*                DESTINATION PROCESSING THUS INDICATING THAT       */ 02336000
*/*                THE SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS (ISTZLFAB WILL       */ 02337000
*/*                NOT WAIT FOR THE I/O TO COMPLETE).                */ 02338000
*/*        ENDIF (LCPB ASSOCIATED WITH THE QUIESCE FSB OR THE NCSPL).*/ 02339000
*/*    ENDIF (LCPB IS RECURSIVE).                                    */ 02340000
*/*    LOOK AT THE NEXT LCPB (IF THERE IS ONE) ON THE WAIT QUEUE.    */ 02341000
*/*  ENDDO (LCPB(S)) ON THE WAIT QUEUE).                             */ 02342000
*/*  IF ISTZLFAB RECEIVED A QUIESCE FSB                              */ 02343000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 02344000
*/*      CALL FREERTN TO RELEASE THE BUFFER CONTAINING THE QUIESCE   */ 02345000
*/*          FSB.                                            @AS33958*/ 02346000
*/*    ELSE (RECEIVED A NCSPL)                                       */ 02347000
*/*      POST VARY'S RPH IN THE NCSPL.                               */ 02348000
*/*  ENDIF (ISTZLFAB RECEIVED A QUIESCE FSB).                        */ 02349000
*/*                                                                  */ 02350000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (INOPRTN).                                             */ 02351000
*/*                                                                  */ 02352000
*/********************************************************************/ 02353000
*                                                                  1514 02354000
*INOPRTN:                                                          1514 02355000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1514 02356000
         B     @PB00007                                            1514 02357000
INOPRTN  DS    0H                                                  1515 02358000
*   RFY                                                            1515 02359000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1515 02360000
*   ZCRSVF2=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 02361000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF2(,ZCRRPTR)                             1516 02362000
*   RFY                                                            1517 02363000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1517 02364000
*   LCPBPTR=ATCTPWQA;               /* POINT TO THE FIRST LCPB ON THE   02365000
*                                      WAIT QUEUE.                   */ 02366000
         L     LCPBPTR,ATCTPWQA(,VTCVTPTR)                         1518 02367000
*   RFY                                                            1519 02368000
*     ISTFSB BASED(BFRPTR);         /* REBASE THE FSB.               */ 02369000
*   BFRPTR=RPHWEA;                  /* POINT TO THE WORK ELEMENT.    */ 02370000
         L     BFRPTR,RPHWEA(,RPHAPTR)                             1520 02371000
*   ZCRSVWK5=BFRPTR;                /* SAVE POINTER TO THE BUFFER.   */ 02372000
         ST    BFRPTR,ZCRSVWK5(,ZCRRPTR)                           1521 02373000
*   DO WHILE((LCPBPTR&MASK)¬=0);    /* LOOP THROUGH THE LCPB(S) ON 1522 02374000
*                                      THE WAIT QUEUE.               */ 02375000
         B     @DE01522                                            1522 02376000
@DL01522 DS    0H                                                  1523 02377000
*     ICNCBPTR=LCCWDATA;            /* GET PTR TO ICNCB FROM LCPB.   */ 02378000
         L     @15,LCPNXLCW(,LCPBPTR)                              1523 02379000
         L     ICNCBPTR,LCCWDATA(,@15)                             1523 02380000
*     DO WHILE ICNCBPTR->NCBNSNA¬=0;/* IF A REMOTE ICNCB THEN        */ 02381000
         B     @DE01524                                            1524 02382000
@DL01524 DS    0H                                                  1525 02383000
*       ICNCBPTR=ICNCBPTR->NCBNSNA; /* GET PTR TO THE LOCAL ICNCB.   */ 02384000
         L     ICNCBPTR,NCBNSNA(,ICNCBPTR)                         1525 02385000
*     END;                          /* END SEARCH FOR LOCAL ICNCB.   */ 02386000
@DE01524 L     @00,NCBNSNA(,ICNCBPTR)                              1526 02387000
         LTR   @00,@00                                             1526 02388000
         BNZ   @DL01524                                            1526 02389000
*     IF LCPZRT00=ON|(FSBTYPE=FSTYPE&FSBICNCB=ICNCBPTR)/* LCPB     1527 02390000
*                                      RECURSIVE OR QUIESCE ICNCB  1527 02391000
*                                      MATCHES WAIT QUEUE LCPB OR    */ 02392000
*         |(FSBTYPE¬=FSTYPE&        /* AN INOPERATIVE IS RECEIVED    */ 02393000
*         LCPCID=NCSPLCID) THEN     /* FOR THE WAIT QUEUE LCPB THEN  */ 02394000
         TM    LCPZRT00(LCPBPTR),B'10000000'                       1527 02395000
         BO    @RT01527                                            1527 02396000
         CLI   FSBTYPE(BFRPTR),X'02'                               1527 02397000
         BNE   @GL00018                                            1527 02398000
         C     ICNCBPTR,FSBICNCB(,BFRPTR)                          1527 02399000
         BE    @RT01527                                            1527 02400000
@GL00018 CLI   FSBTYPE(BFRPTR),X'02'                               1527 02401000
         BE    @RF01527                                            1527 02402000
         CLC   LCPCID(4,LCPBPTR),NCSPLCID(BFRPTR)                  1527 02403000
         BNE   @RF01527                                            1527 02404000
@RT01527 DS    0H                                                  1528 02405000
*       DO;                                                        1528 02406000
*         CIDPARM=LCPCID;           /* GET CID               @ZA30934*/ 02407000
         L     CIDPARM,LCPCID(,LCPBPTR)                            1529 02408000
*         CALL CIDRTN;              /* LOCATE THE NCB        @ZA30934*/ 02409000
         BAL   @14,CIDRTN                                          1530 02410000
*         CALL DEQRTN;              /* DEQUEUE THE LCPB.             */ 02411000
         BAL   @14,DEQRTN                                          1531 02412000
*         IF LCPZRT00=ON THEN       /* IF LCPB IS RECURSIVE THEN     */ 02413000
         TM    LCPZRT00(LCPBPTR),B'10000000'                       1532 02414000
         BNO   @RF01532                                            1532 02415000
*           DO;                                                    1533 02416000
*             WKREG=LCPBPTR;        /* POINT TO THE LCPB.            */ 02417000
         LR    WKREG,LCPBPTR                                       1534 02418000
*             CALL FREERTN;         /* RELEASE THE LCPB.             */ 02419000
         BAL   @14,FREERTN                                         1535 02420000
*           END;                    /* END RECURSIVE LCPB.           */ 02421000
*         ELSE                                                     1537 02422000
*           DO;                     /* NOT RECURSIVE LCPB.           */ 02423000
         B     @RC01532                                            1537 02424000
@RF01532 DS    0H                                                  1538 02425000
*             BFRPTR=0;             /* ZERO PTR TO BUFFER.           */ 02426000
         SLR   BFRPTR,BFRPTR                                       1538 02427000
*             CALL TPQUERTN;        /* QUEUE THE FSB FOR CLSDST.     */ 02428000
         BAL   @14,TPQUERTN                                        1539 02429000
*             BFRPTR=ZCRSVWK5;      /* RESTORE THE POINTER TO THE  1540 02430000
*                                      WORK ELEMENT.                 */ 02431000
         L     BFRPTR,ZCRSVWK5(,ZCRRPTR)                           1540 02432000
*           END;                    /* END NOT RECURSIVE.            */ 02433000
*         LCPBPTR=ATCTPWQA;         /* POINT TO THE NEXT LCPB.       */ 02434000
@RC01532 L     LCPBPTR,ATCTPWQA(,VTCVTPTR)                         1542 02435000
*       END;                        /* END RECURSIVE LCPB OR LCPB IS    02436000
*                                      ASSOCIATED WITH QUIESCE FSB OR   02437000
*                                      INOPERATIVE BOX.              */ 02438000
*     ELSE                          /* LCPB IS NOT RECURSIVE AND IS     02439000
*                                      NOT ASSOCIATED WITH QUIESCE 1544 02440000
*                                      FSB OR INOPERATIVE BOX.       */ 02441000
*       LCPBPTR=LCPCHAIN;           /* POINT TO THE NEXT LCPB.       */ 02442000
         B     @RC01527                                            1544 02443000
@RF01527 L     LCPBPTR,LCPCHAIN(,LCPBPTR)                          1544 02444000
*   END;                            /* END LOOP THROUGH LCPB(S).     */ 02445000
@RC01527 DS    0H                                                  1545 02446000
@DE01522 LR    @00,LCPBPTR                                         1545 02447000
         N     @00,@CF01714                                        1545 02448000
         LTR   @00,@00                                             1545 02449000
         BNZ   @DL01522                                            1545 02450000
*   IF FSBTYPE=FSTYPE THEN          /* IF WORK ELEMENT IS A FSB      */ 02451000
         CLI   FSBTYPE(BFRPTR),X'02'                               1546 02452000
         BNE   @RF01546                                            1546 02453000
*     DO;                           /* (QUIESCE) THEN                */ 02454000
*       RFY                                                        1548 02455000
*         ISTFSB BASED(ADDR(ZIBFSB));/* REBASE FSB.                  */ 02456000
*       BFRPTR=BFRPTR-(ADDR(ZIBFSB)-ADDR(ISTZIBUF));/* POINT TO    1549 02457000
*                                      BEGINNING OF BUFFER.          */ 02458000
         LA    @00,ZIBFSB(,BFRPTR)                                 1549 02459000
         LCR   @00,@00                                             1549 02460000
         ALR   @00,BFRPTR                                          1549 02461000
         ALR   BFRPTR,@00                                          1549 02462000
*       WKREG=BFRPTR;               /* POINT TO BUFFER TO BE FREED.  */ 02463000
         LR    WKREG,BFRPTR                                        1550 02464000
*       CALL FREERTN;               /* FREE THE BUFFER.      @AS33958*/ 02465000
         BAL   @14,FREERTN                                         1551 02466000
*     END;                          /* END WORK ELEMENT IS A FSB.    */ 02467000
*   ELSE                            /* WORK ELEMENT IS A NCSPL.      */ 02468000
*/*TPPOST  (NCSPLRPH)                                                */ 02469000
*                                                                  1553 02470000
*     DO;                           /* DECLARE AND RESTRICT REGS     */ 02471000
         B     @RC01546                                            1553 02472000
@RF01546 DS    0H                                                  1554 02473000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  1554 02474000
*        (GPR00F,                                                  1554 02475000
*         GPR01F,                                                  1554 02476000
*         GPR04F,                                                  1554 02477000
*         GPR05F,                                                  1554 02478000
*         GPR06F,                                                  1554 02479000
*         GPR14F,                                                  1554 02480000
*         GPR15F) RSTD;             /* 0,1,4,5,6,14, AND 15          */ 02481000
*/* ATBUILD (ISTPAB,ISTDYPAB,ISTRPH)                                 */ 02482000
*/* END OF ATBUILD                                                   */ 02483000
*                                                                  1555 02484000
*       GEN REFS(GPR01P,GPR02F,GPR06F) SETS(RPHWORK);              1555 02485000

*/********************************************************************/ 02634000
*/*                                                                  */ 02635000
*/*TPQUERTN: BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                */ 02636000
*/*                                                                  */ 02637000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO QUEUE THE FSB FOR CLOSE DESTINATION PROCESSING TO  */ 02638000
*/*    INDICATE THAT THE SESSION NO LONGER EXISTS.                   */ 02639000
*/*                                                                  */ 02640000
*/*  INCLUDE DNCBPRC TO CLEAN UP THE DNCB.                   @AS33958*/ 02641000
*/*  IF THERE IS NO FSB                                              */ 02642000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 02643000
*/*      CALL ISTZDFA0 (EXTERNAL), THE TPIOS ALLOCATION ROUTINE,     */ 02644000
*/*          TO ALLOCATE A FSB.                                      */ 02645000
*/*  ENDIF (THERE IS NO FSB).                                        */ 02646000
*/*  INITIALIZE THE REQUIRED FSB FIELDS TO INDICATE THAT THE SESSION */ 02647000
*/*      NO LONGER EXISTS.                                           */ 02648000
*/*  ISSUE TPQUE(NORM) TO QUEUE THE FSB TO THE PAB POINTED TO BY THE */ 02649000
*/*      LCPB ON THE WAIT QUEUE TO INDICATE THAT THE SESSION HAS     */ 02650000
*/*      BEEN TERMINATED.                                            */ 02651000
*/*                                                                  */ 02652000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (TPQUERTN).                                            */ 02653000
*/*                                                                  */ 02654000
*/********************************************************************/ 02655000
*                                                                  1607 02656000
*TPQUERTN:                                                         1607 02657000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1607 02658000
TPQUERTN DS    0H                                                  1608 02659000
*   RFY                                                            1608 02660000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1608 02661000
*   ZCRSVF3=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 02662000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF3(,ZCRRPTR)                             1609 02663000
*   RFY                                                            1610 02664000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1610 02665000
*   RFY                                                            1611 02666000
*     ISTFSB BASED(BFRPTR);         /* BASE THE FSB.                 */ 02667000
*   RFY                                                            1612 02668000
*     ISTFDB BASED(ADDR(FSBFDB));   /* BASE THE FDB.                 */ 02669000
*                                                                  1612 02670000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02671000
*   /*                                                               */ 02672000
*   /* SEGMENT(DNCBPRC)REQUEST                                       */ 02673000
*   /*                                                               */ 02674000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02675000
*                                                                  1613 02676000
*   DO;                                                            1613 02677000
*     GOTO DNCBPRC;                                                1614 02678000
         B     DNCBPRC                                             1614 02679000
*DNCBPRC#:                                                         1615 02680000
*   END;                            /* CLEANUP DNCB IF REQUIRED.   1615 02681000
*                                                            @AS33958*/ 02682000
DNCBPRC# DS    0H                                                  1616 02683000
*   IF BFRPTR=0 THEN                /* IF NO FSB                     */ 02684000
         LTR   BFRPTR,BFRPTR                                       1616 02685000
         BNZ   @RF01616                                            1616 02686000
*     DO;                           /* THEN                          */ 02687000
*       ZCRPCOD1=0;                 /* ZERO PARAMETER FLAGS.         */ 02688000
         MVI   ZCRPCOD1(ZCRRPTR),X'00'                             1618 02689000
*       ZCRPFSB=ON;                 /* INDICATE OBTAIN FSB.          */ 02690000
         OI    ZCRPFSB(ZCRRPTR),B'00100000'                        1619 02691000
*       CALL ATCZPSVT->ZPSZDFA0;    /* CALL BUFFER ALLOCATION.       */ 02692000
         L     @14,ATCZPSVT(,VTCVTPTR)                             1620 02693000
         L     @15,ZPSZDFA0(,@14)                                  1620 02694000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1620 02695000
*       BFRPTR=RPHSRPRM;            /* POINT TO THE FSB.             */ 02696000
         L     BFRPTR,RPHSRPRM(,RPHAPTR)                           1621 02697000
*     END;                          /* END NO FSB.                   */ 02698000
*   ELSE                                                           1623 02699000
*     DO;                           /* IF FSB EXISTS THEN            */ 02700000
         B     @RC01616                                            1623 02701000
@RF01616 DS    0H                                                  1624 02702000
*       ISTFSB=ISTFSB&&ISTFSB;      /* ZERO THE FSB.         @AS33958*/ 02703000
         XC    ISTFSB(44,BFRPTR),ISTFSB(BFRPTR)                    1624 02704000
*       FSBTYPE=FSTYPE;             /* SET UP FSB TYPE.              */ 02705000
         MVI   FSBTYPE(BFRPTR),X'02'                               1625 02706000
*       FSBLNGTH=LENGTH(ISTFSB);    /* SET UP FSB LENGTH.            */ 02707000
         MVI   FSBLNGTH(BFRPTR),X'2C'                              1626 02708000
*       FSBFSBA=0;                  /* ZERO PTR TO THE NEXT FSB.     */ 02709000
         SLR   @00,@00                                             1627 02710000
         ST    @00,FSBFSBA(,BFRPTR)                                1627 02711000
*     END;                          /* END FSB EXISTS.               */ 02712000
*   FSBMJRCD=FRNORM;                /* SET MAJOR RC TO INDICATE    1629 02713000
*                                      NORMAL FEEDBACK.              */ 02714000
@RC01616 MVI   FSBMJRCD(BFRPTR),X'00'                              1629 02715000
*   FSBMNRCD=FRMOK;                 /* SET MINOR RC FOR OK SO FAR.   */ 02716000
         MVI   FSBMNRCD(BFRPTR),X'00'                              1630 02717000
*   FSBLCPB=LCPBPTR;                /* SET POINTER TO THE LCPB.      */ 02718000
         ST    LCPBPTR,FSBLCPB(,BFRPTR)                            1631 02719000
*   FDBOFSET=ADDR(FSBFDB)-BFRPTR;   /* SET FDB OFFSET.               */ 02720000
         LA    @00,FSBFDB(,BFRPTR)                                 1632 02721000
         SLR   @00,BFRPTR                                          1632 02722000
         STH   @00,FDBOFSET+32(,BFRPTR)                            1632 02723000
*/*  TPQUE (BFRPTR,LCPRPHA->PABWEQA) NORM                            */ 02724000
*                                                                  1633 02725000
*   DO;                                                            1633 02726000
*     RFY                                                          1634 02727000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1634 02728000
*       GPR01P,                                                    1634 02729000
*       GPR04P,                                                    1634 02730000
*       GPR05P,                                                    1634 02731000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              1634 02732000
*     GEN REFS(GPR01P) SETS(RPHWORK)(STM GPR02P,GPR08P,RPHWORK(GPR01P)) 02733000
*         ;                                                        1635 02734000
         STM GPR02P,GPR08P,RPHWORK(GPR01P)                              02735000
*     GPR00P=0;                                                    1636 02736000
         SLR   GPR00P,GPR00P                                       1636 02737000
*     GPR15P=ADDR(LCPRPHA->PABWEQA);/* HOLD PAB PTR                  */ 02738000
         L     GPR15P,LCPRPHA(,LCPBPTR)                            1637 02739000
*     GPR04P=BFRPTR;                /* WORK ELE PTR                  */ 02740000
         LR    GPR04P,BFRPTR                                       1638 02741000
*     GPR05P=GPR15P;                /* PASS PAB PTR                  */ 02742000
         LR    GPR05P,GPR15P                                       1639 02743000
*     CALL ATCLCPTR->ATCAP37->ISTAPC37;                            1640 02744000
         L     @14,ATCLCPTR                                        1640 02745000
         L     @15,ATCAP37(,@14)                                   1640 02746000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1640 02747000
*     GEN(NOPR  0)                                                 1641 02748000
*     NOSETS NOREFS;                                               1641 02749000
         NOPR  0                                                        02750000
*     RFY                                                          1642 02751000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1642 02752000
*       GPR01P,                                                    1642 02753000
*       GPR04P,                                                    1642 02754000
*       GPR05P,                                                    1642 02755000
*       GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                            1642 02756000
*   END;                            /* *** END OF TPQUE GENERATION 1643 02757000
*                                      QUEUE THE FSB FOR CLSDST.     */ 02758000
*   ZCRTSW2=ON;                     /* INDICATE THE FSB IS QUEUED FOR   02759000
*                                      CLSDST (BUFFER IS BEING USED).   02760000
*                                                            @AS33958*/ 02761000
         OI    ZCRTSW2(ZCRRPTR),B'01000000'                        1644 02762000
*   RFY                                                            1645 02763000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1645 02764000
*   REG14=ZCRSVF3;                  /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS.       */ 02765000
         L     REG14,ZCRSVF3(,ZCRRPTR)                             1646 02766000
*   RFY                                                            1647 02767000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1647 02768000
*   RETURN;                                                        1648 02769000
@EL00008 DS    0H                                                  1648 02770000
@EF00008 DS    0H                                                  1648 02771000
@ER00008 BR    @14                                                 1648 02772000
         EJECT                                                          02773000
*                                                                  1649 02774000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02775000
*   /*                                                               */ 02776000
*   /* SEGMENT(DNCBPRC)START                                         */ 02777000
*   /*                                                               */ 02778000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02779000
*                                                                  1649 02780000
*   DO;                                                            1649 02781000
*     GOTO DNCBPRC@;                                               1650 02782000
*DNCBPRC:                                                          1651 02783000
*   END;                                                           1651 02784000
*                                                                  1651 02785000
DNCBPRC  DS    0H                                                  1652 02786000
*/********************************************************************/ 02787000
*/*                                                                  */ 02788000
*/*DNCBPRC:BGNSEGMENT (BLOCK).                               @AS33958*/ 02789000
*/*                                                                  */ 02790000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO DO ANY REQUIRED CLEANUP PROCESSING FOR THE DNCB.   */ 02791000
*/*                                                                  */ 02792000
*/*  IF THE DNCB IS AVAILABLE AND THE DEVICE IS NON-SNA              */ 02793000
*/*    THEN                                                          */ 02794000
*/*      CALL ISTZDFB0 (EXTERNAL), THE BUFFER DEALLOCATION           */ 02795000
*/*          ROUTINE, TO PURGE THE FREE LSCB QUEUE, IF               */ 02796000
*/*          NECESSARY.                                              */ 02797000
*/*      IF IT IS A MULTI-COMPONENT DEVICE                           */ 02798000
*/*        THEN                                                      */ 02799000
*/*          DECREMENT THE SESSION COUNT IN THE DNCB BY ONE          */ 02800000
*/*              IF MORE THAN ONE COMPONENT IS ACTIVE.               */ 02801000
*/*          TURN OFF THE DISCONNECT OUTSTANDING FLAG IN THE DNCB.   */ 02802000
*/*          CLEAR THE I/O SCHEDULED COUNT IN THE DNCB.              */ 02803000
*/*      ENDIF (MULTI-COMPONENT DEVICE).                             */ 02804000
*/*      IF THERE ARE MULTIPLE FMCB(S)                               */ 02805000
*/*        THEN                                                      */ 02806000
*/*          NOTE - THIS WILL BE TRUE ONLY FOR PORT SOLICITOR OR     */ 02807000
*/*              CLUSTER SOLICITOR.                                  */ 02808000
*/*          CLEAN UP THE SESSION FLAGS IN THE DNCB.                 */ 02809000
*/*          ZERO THE POINTER IN THE DNCB TO THE ACTIVE FMCB.        */ 02810000
*/*          SET THE TASK ID IN THE NCB TO THE VTAM TASK ID.         */ 02811000
*/*      ENDIF (MULTIPLE FMCB(S).                                    */ 02812000
*/*  ENDIF (DNCB IS AVAILABLE AND NON-SNA DEVICE).                   */ 02813000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (DNCBPRC).                                             */ 02814000
*/*                                                                  */ 02815000
*/********************************************************************/ 02816000
*                                                                  1652 02817000
*   IF ICNCBPTR¬=NCBPTR THEN        /* IF THE NCB IS AVAILABLE THEN  */ 02818000
         CR    ICNCBPTR,NCBPTR                                     1652 02819000
         BE    @RF01652                                            1652 02820000
*     IF NCBTYPE=DNTYPE THEN        /* IF THE DEVICE IS NON-SNA THEN */ 02821000
         CLI   NCBTYPE(NCBPTR),X'05'                               1653 02822000
         BNE   @RF01653                                            1653 02823000
*       DO;                         /* THEN CLEAN UP DNCB.           */ 02824000
*         WKREG=ADDR(DNCZC001);     /*                       @ZA26159*/ 02825000
         LA    WKREG,DNCZC001(,NCBPTR)                             1655 02826000
*         PABWQCHN=PABWQCHN&&PABWQCHN;/* ZERO WORK ELEMENT @ AND   1656 02827000
*                                      CHAIN POINTER.        @ZA26159*/ 02828000
         XC    PABWQCHN(8,WKREG),PABWQCHN(WKREG)                   1656 02829000
*         PABERRLK=OFF;             /* CLEAR THE ERROR LOCK. @ZA26159*/ 02830000
*         PABINHBT=OFF;             /* CLEAR THE INHIBIT FLG @ZA26159*/ 02831000
         L     @00,PABINHBT(,WKREG)                                1658 02832000
@GL00022 LR    @15,@00                                             1658 02833000
         N     @15,@CF05608                                        1658 02834000
         CS    @00,@15,PABINHBT(WKREG)                             1658 02835000
         BNE   @GL00022                                            1658 02836000
*         PABRPHA=PABRPHA&&PABRPHA; /* ZERO RPH POINTER.     @ZA26159*/ 02837000
         L     @15,PABRPHA-1(,WKREG)                               1659 02838000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         1659 02839000
         LR    @00,@15                                             1659 02840000
         XR    @00,@15                                             1659 02841000
         STCM  @00,7,PABRPHA(WKREG)                                1659 02842000
*         IF DNCZX001¬=0 THEN       /* IF THE FREE LSCB QUEUE IS TO  */ 02843000
         CLI   DNCZX001(NCBPTR),0                                  1660 02844000
         BE    @RF01660                                            1660 02845000
*           DO;                     /* BE PURGED THEN                */ 02846000
*             ZCRPCOD1=0;           /* CLEAR THE PARAMETER FLAGS.    */ 02847000
         MVI   ZCRPCOD1(ZCRRPTR),X'00'                             1662 02848000
*             ZCRPLSBQ=ON;          /* INDICATE PURGE LSCB QUEUE.    */ 02849000
         OI    ZCRPLSBQ(ZCRRPTR),B'00010000'                       1663 02850000
*             CALL ISTZDFB0;        /* CALL BUFFER DEALLOCATION RTN. */ 02851000
         L     @14,ATCZPSVT(,VTCVTPTR)                             1664 02852000
         L     @15,ZPSZDFB0(,@14)                                  1664 02853000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1664 02854000
*           END;                    /* END FREE LSCB QUEUE PURGED.   */ 02855000
*         ELSE                                                     1666 02856000
*           ;                       /* FREE LSCB Q DOES NOT NEED TO     02857000
*                                      BE PURGED.                    */ 02858000
@RF01660 DS    0H                                                  1667 02859000
*         IF NCBNSNA->NCBTYPE=DNTYPE THEN/* IF MULTI-COMPONENT       */ 02860000
         L     @15,NCBNSNA(,NCBPTR)                                1667 02861000
         CLI   NCBTYPE(@15),X'05'                                  1667 02862000
         BNE   @RF01667                                            1667 02863000
*           DO;                     /* DEVICE THEN                   */ 02864000
*             IF NCBNSNA->DNCZX003¬=0 THEN/* IF MORE THAN ONE      1669 02865000
*                                      COMPONENT IS ACTIVE THEN      */ 02866000
         CLI   DNCZX003(@15),0                                     1669 02867000
         BE    @RF01669                                            1669 02868000
*               NCBNSNA->DNCZX003=NCBNSNA->DNCZX003-1;/* DECREMENT 1670 02869000
*                                      THE SESSION COUNT BY ONE.     */ 02870000
         SLR   @00,@00                                             1670 02871000
         IC    @00,DNCZX003(,@15)                                  1670 02872000
         BCTR  @00,0                                               1670 02873000
         STC   @00,DNCZX003(,@15)                                  1670 02874000
*             ELSE                                                 1671 02875000
*               ;                   /* NOT MORE THAN ONE COMPONENT 1671 02876000
*                                      ACTIVE.                       */ 02877000
@RF01669 DS    0H                                                  1672 02878000
*             NCBNSNA->DNCDISC=OFF; /* TURN OFF DISCONNECT         1672 02879000
*                                      OUTSTANDING FLAG.             */ 02880000
         L     @15,NCBNSNA(,NCBPTR)                                1672 02881000
         NI    DNCDISC(@15),B'11110111'                            1672 02882000
*             NCBNSNA->DNCACIP=0;   /* CLEAR THE SCHEDULE COUNT.     */ 02883000
         MVI   DNCACIP(@15),X'00'                                  1673 02884000
*           END;                    /* END MULTI-COMP PROCESSING.    */ 02885000
*         IF NCBFMCBA->FMCFMCBA¬=0 THEN/* IF ANOTHER FMCB ACTIVE   1675 02886000
*                                      (PORT SOLICITOR OR CLUSTER    */ 02887000
@RF01667 SLR   @15,@15                                             1675 02888000
         L     @14,NCBFMCBA(,NCBPTR)                               1675 02889000
         C     @15,FMCFMCBA(,@14)                                  1675 02890000
         BE    @RF01675                                            1675 02891000
*           DO;                     /* SOLICITOR) THEN               */ 02892000
*             DNCACIP=0;            /* CLEAR THE SCHEDULE COUNT.     */ 02893000
         MVI   DNCACIP(NCBPTR),X'00'                               1677 02894000
*             DNCZF001=OFF;         /* TURN OFF ERROR LCK INDICATOR. */ 02895000
*             DNCZRSCH=ON;          /* INDICATE DEVICE RESCHEDULED.  */ 02896000
*             DNCZF002=OFF;         /* TURN OFF DIALOGUE SCHEDULING     02897000
*                                      IS IN PROGRESS.               */ 02898000
         OI    DNCZRSCH(NCBPTR),B'00000100'                        1680 02899000
         NI    DNCZF001(NCBPTR),B'01111101'                        1680 02900000
*             DNCZV001=0;           /* CLEAR ACTIVE FMCB POINTER.    */ 02901000
         STCM  @15,7,DNCZV001(NCBPTR)                              1681 02902000
*             ADDR(DNCZC001)->PABWEQG=OFF;/* TURN OFF THE GATE BIT IN   02903000
*                                      THE TIP                       */ 02904000
         LA    @15,96                                              1682 02905000
         ALR   @15,NCBPTR                                          1682 02906000
         NI    PABWEQG(@15),B'01111111'                            1682 02907000
*             ADDR(DNCZC001)->PABDVTA=DNCZV004;/* SET PAB DVT PTR TO    02908000
*                                      DIALOGUE SCHEDULER DVT.       */ 02909000
         MVC   PABDVTA(3,@15),DNCZV004+1(NCBPTR)                   1683 02910000
*             NCBTSKID=ATCCDTID;    /* SET TASK ID TO VTAM TASK ID.  */ 02911000
         L     @00,ATCCDTID(,VTCVTPTR)                             1684 02912000
         ST    @00,NCBTSKID(,NCBPTR)                               1684 02913000
*           END;                    /* END MULTIPLE FMCB(S).         */ 02914000
*         ELSE                                                     1686 02915000
*           ;                       /* SINGLE FMCB.                  */ 02916000
@RF01675 DS    0H                                                  1687 02917000
*       END;                        /* END NON-SNA DEVICE.           */ 02918000
*     ELSE                                                         1688 02919000
*       DO;                         /* SNA DEVICE.                   */ 02920000
         B     @RC01653                                            1688 02921000
@RF01653 DS    0H                                                  1689 02922000
*         IF NCBTYPE=LUTYPE THEN                                   1689 02923000
         CLI   NCBTYPE(NCBPTR),X'25'                               1689 02924000
         BNE   @RF01689                                            1689 02925000
*           DO;                     /* IS NCB LUNCB ?        @ZA26159*/ 02926000
*             WKREG=ADDR(LUNZC001); /*                       @ZA26159*/ 02927000
         LA    WKREG,LUNZC001(,NCBPTR)                             1691 02928000
*             PABWQCHN=PABWQCHN&&PABWQCHN;/* ZERO WORK ELEMENT @ AND    02929000
*                                      CHAIN POINTER.        @ZA26159*/ 02930000
         XC    PABWQCHN(8,WKREG),PABWQCHN(WKREG)                   1692 02931000
*             PABERRLK=OFF;         /* CLEAR THE ERROR LOCK. @ZA26159*/ 02932000
*             PABINHBT=OFF;         /* CLEAR THE INHIBIT FLG @ZA26159*/ 02933000

@GL00023 LR    @15,@00                                             1694 02935000
         N     @15,@CF05608                                        1694 02936000
         CS    @00,@15,PABINHBT(WKREG)                             1694 02937000
         BNE   @GL00023                                            1694 02938000
*             PABRPHA=PABRPHA&&PABRPHA;/* ZERO RPH POINTER.  @ZA26159*/ 02939000
         L     @15,PABRPHA-1(,WKREG)                               1695 02940000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         1695 02941000
         LR    @00,@15                                             1695 02942000
         XR    @00,@15                                             1695 02943000
         STCM  @00,7,PABRPHA(WKREG)                                1695 02944000
*           END;                    /* NCB IS LUNCB          @ZA26159*/ 02945000
*         FMCSNBI=OFF;              /* TURN OFF SESSION NOT BOUND  1697 02946000
*                                      FLAG.                 @AS33958*/ 02947000
@RF01689 DS    0H                                                  1698 02948000
*         FMCCIPI=OFF;              /* TURN OFF CLEAR IN PROGRESS  1698 02949000
*                                      FLAG.                 @AS33958*/ 02950000
*         FMCUIPI=OFF;              /* TURN OFF UNBIND IN PROGRESS 1699 02951000
*                                      FLAG.                 @AS33958*/ 02952000
         NI    FMCSNBI(FMCBPTR),B'00011111'                        1699 02953000
*       END;                        /* END SNA DEVICE.               */ 02954000
*   ELSE                                                           1701 02955000
*     ;                             /* NCB IS NOT AVAILABLE.         */ 02956000
*                                                                  1701 02957000
@RF01652 DS    0H                                                  1702 02958000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02959000
*   /*                                                               */ 02960000
*   /* SEGMENT(DNCBPRC)FINISH                                        */ 02961000
*   /*                                                               */ 02962000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02963000
*                                                                  1702 02964000
*   DO;                                                            1702 02965000
@RC01652 DS    0H                                                  1703 02966000
*     GOTO DNCBPRC#;                                               1703 02967000
         B     DNCBPRC#                                            1703 02968000
*DNCBPRC@:                                                         1704 02969000
*   END;                                                           1704 02970000
*   END TPQUERTN;                                                  1705 02971000
         B     @EL00008                                            1705 02972000
         EJECT                                                          02973000
*                                                                  1706 02974000
*/********************************************************************/ 02975000
*/*                                                                  */ 02976000
*/*DEQRTN:BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                   */ 02977000
*/*                                                                  */ 02978000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO DEQUEUE THE SPECIFIED LCPB FROM THE WAIT QUEUE     */ 02979000
*/*    IN THE ATCVT.                                                 */ 02980000
*/*                                                                  */ 02981000
*/*  ISSUE TPDEQ TO DEQUEUE THE SPECIFIED LCPB FROM THE WAIT QUEUE   */ 02982000
*/*      IN THE ATCVT.                                               */ 02983000
*/*                                                                  */ 02984000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(DEQRTN).                                               */ 02985000
*/*                                                                  */ 02986000

*                                                                  1706 02988000
*DEQRTN:                                                           1706 02989000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1706 02990000
DEQRTN   DS    0H                                                  1707 02991000
*   RFY                                                            1707 02992000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1707 02993000
*   ZCRSVF4=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 02994000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF4(,ZCRRPTR)                             1708 02995000
*   RFY                                                            1709 02996000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1709 02997000
*                                                                  1709 02998000

*                                                                  1710 03000000
*   DO;                             /* BEGIN TPDEQ CODE GENERATION   */ 03001000

*     GPR15P=ADDR(ATCTPWQA);        /* ADDRESS QUEUE POINTER         */ 03007000

*     GPR03P=LCPBPTR|FMZCA043;                                     1715 03014000

         LR    GPR14P,@11                                          1716 03019000

*     DO WHILE(GPR02P¬=GPR14P);                                    1719 03024000
         B     @DE01719                                            1719 03025000

*FMZL2164:                                                         1720 03027000
*       ;                                                          1720 03028000

*       IF GPR02P=GPR03P THEN                                      1721 03030000

*           CS(GPR02P,GPR00P,GPR15P->PABWEQA);                     1724 03036000
         CS    GPR02P,@00,PABWEQA(GPR15P)                          1724 03037000
*           BC(7,FMZL3164);                                        1725 03038000
         BC    7,FMZL3164                                          1725 03039000
*           GPR14P=GPR02P;                                         1726 03040000

*           GPR14P->WKECHAIN=0;                                    1727 03042000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1727 03043000
         ST    @11,WKECHAIN(,GPR14P)                               1727 03044000

*           IF(GPR02P->WKECHAIN)=GPR14P THEN                       1730 03050000

         CR    @11,GPR14P                                          1730 03052000

*             GOTO ISTA0164;                                       1731 03054000

*               GPR15P=ADDR(GPR02P->WKECHAIN);                     1733 03057000
         LA    GPR15P,WKECHAIN(,GPR02P)                            1733 03058000
*               GPR02P=GPR02P->WKECHAIN;                           1734 03059000

*               GOTO FMZL2164;                                     1735 03061000
         B     FMZL2164                                            1735 03062000
*             END;                                                 1736 03063000
*         END;                                                     1737 03064000
*FMZL3164:                                                         1738 03065000
*       ;                                                          1738 03066000
