*     END;                                                         1739 03069000
@DE01719 CR    GPR02P,GPR14P                                       1739 03070000
         BNE   @DL01719                                            1739 03071000
*ISTA0164:                                                         1740 03072000
*     ;                                                            1740 03073000

*     LM(GPR02P,GPR03P,GPR01P->RPHWORK(5:12));                     1741 03075000
         LM    GPR02P,GPR03P,RPHWORK+4(GPR01P)                     1741 03076000
*     RFY                                                          1742 03077000
*      (GPR02P,                                                    1742 03078000

*/*                                                                  */ 03105000
*/*FREERTN: BGNSEGMENT (SUBROUTINE).                                 */ 03106000
*/*                                                                  */ 03107000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO RELEASE THE STORAGE THAT WAS USED FOR THE LCPB,    */ 03108000

*/*                                                                  */ 03112000
*/*ENDSEGMENT(FREERTN).                                              */ 03113000
*/*                                                                  */ 03114000
*/********************************************************************/ 03115000
*                                                                  1752 03116000
*FREERTN:                                                          1752 03117000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1752 03118000
FREERTN  DS    0H                                                  1753 03119000
*   RFY                                                            1753 03120000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  1753 03121000
*   ZCRSVF3=REG14;                  /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS.          */ 03122000
         ST    REG14,ZCRSVF3(,ZCRRPTR)                             1754 03123000
*   RFY                                                            1755 03124000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                1755 03125000
*                                                                  1755 03126000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03127000
*   /*                                                               */ 03128000
*   /* RELSTORE BUFADDR(WKREG)CLEAR(YES)                             */ 03129000
*   /*                                                               */ 03130000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03131000
*                                                                  1756 03132000
*   DO;                                                            1756 03133000
*                                                                  1756 03134000
*/* ATBUILD (ISTATCVT,ISTRPH)                                        */ 03135000
*/* END OF ATBUILD                                                   */ 03136000
*                                                                  1757 03137000
*     RFY                                                          1757 03138000
*      (GPR02P,                                                    1757 03139000
*       GPR03P,                                                    1757 03140000
*       GPR04P,                                                    1757 03141000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              1757 03142000
*     RFY                                                          1758 03143000
*      (GPR01P,                                                    1758 03144000
*       GPR13P) RSTD;                                              1758 03145000
*     GENERATE REFS(GPR01P,GPR02P,GPR13P) SETS(RPHWORK);           1759 03146000
          STM GPR02P,GPR13P,RPHWORK(GPR01P)                             03147000
*     RFY                                                          1760 03148000
*       GPR13P UNRSTD;                                             1760 03149000
*     GPR04P=WKREG|'80000000'X;                                    1761 03150000
         LR    GPR04P,WKREG                                        1761 03151000
         O     GPR04P,@CF01716                                     1761 03152000
*     DCL                                                          1762 03153000
*       1 FMZA0170 FIXED(31) STATIC LOCAL,                         1762 03154000
*        2 * FIXED(8) INIT(64),                                    1762 03155000
*        2 * PTR(24) INIT(0);                                      1762 03156000
*     GPR03F=FMZA0170;                                             1763 03157000

*       GPR15P=ATCLCPTR;            /* SET UP ATCVT POINTER          */ 03161000
         L     GPR15P,ATCLCPTR                                     1765 03162000

*     GPR02P=GPR15P->ATCBPDA;                                      1767 03164000

         BALR  @14,@15                                             1770 03171000
*     RFY                                                          1771 03172000

*     RFY                                                          1773 03176000

*   END;                            /* *********END OF RELSTORE    1775 03184000

*   /*                                                               */ 03202000

*/********************************************************************/ 03214000
*/*                                                                  */ 03215000
*/*LOCLRTN: BGNSEGMENT (BLOCK).                                      */ 03216000
*/*                                                                  */ 03217000
*/*FUNCTION IS TO PERFORM THE CLEANUP PROCESSING FOR THE             */ 03218000
*/*    LOCAL 3270.                                                   */ 03219000
*/*  FORMAT THE BUFFER TO INITIATE RESET END OF COMMAND      @ZA26631*/ 03220000
*/*                                                                  */ 03221000
*/*ENDSEGMENT (LOCLRTN).                                             */ 03222000
*/*                                                                  */ 03223000
*/********************************************************************/ 03224000
*/*                                                                  */ 03225000
*/* LDNCPQ SHOULD NOT BE ZEROED OR FREED BECAUSE:                    */ 03226000
*/*   (1) IT MAY BE POINTING TO A C.P. ALREADY FREED.                */ 03227000
*/*   (2) THE WRITE C.P. SHOULD FINISH BEFORE ZLAAB GETS CONTROL.    */ 03228000
*/*   (3) THE READ C.P. IS FREED BY ZFA0A (CHANNEL END).             */ 03229000
*/*                                                                  */ 03230000
*/********************************************************************/ 03231000
*/********************************************************************/ 03232000
*                                                                  1784 03233000
*   RFY                                                            1784 03234000
*     ISTFSB BASED(ADDR(ZLBFSB));   /* REBASE FSB            @ZA26631*/ 03235000
*   ZLBCPCF1=ZLBTPIOS;              /* CCW OP CODE TO CONTROL      1785 03236000
*                                                            @ZA26631*/ 03237000
         MVI   ZLBCPCF1(BFRPTR),X'FF'                              1785 03238000
*   ZLBCMOD=ZLBREOF;                /* DO RESET END OF COMMAND     1786 03239000
*                                                            @ZA26631*/ 03240000
         MVI   ZLBCMOD(BFRPTR),X'0C'                               1786 03241000
*   ZLBRQTG='0000'X;                /* ZERO REQUEST TAG TO INDICATE     03242000
*                                      ABEND PROCESS         @ZA26631*/ 03243000
         MVC   ZLBRQTG(2,BFRPTR),@CB02556                          1787 03244000
*   ZLBLCPBA=LCPBPTR;               /* INIT POINTER TO LCPB IN ZLBUF    03245000
*                                                            @ZA26631*/ 03246000
         ST    LCPBPTR,ZLBLCPBA(,BFRPTR)                           1788 03247000
*   ZLBSAF=LCPSAF;                  /* INIT SOURCE N.A.      @ZA26631*/ 03248000
         MVC   ZLBSAF(2,BFRPTR),LCPSAF(LCPBPTR)                    1789 03249000
*   FSBSAF=LCPSAF;                  /* SOURCE N.A. IN FSB OVERLAY IN    03250000
*                                      ZLBUF                 @ZA26631*/ 03251000
         LA    @15,16                                              1790 03252000
         ALR   @15,BFRPTR                                          1790 03253000
         MVC   FSBSAF(2,@15),LCPSAF(LCPBPTR)                       1790 03254000
*   FSBDAF=LCPDAF;                  /* DESTINATION N.A. IN FSB     1791 03255000
*                                      OVERLAY IN ZLBUF      @ZA26631*/ 03256000
         MVC   FSBDAF(2,@15),LCPDAF(LCPBPTR)                       1791 03257000
*   LDNZF007=OFF;                   /* CLEAR THE ATTN RECEIVED FLAG. */ 03258000
         L     @00,LDNZF007-3(,ICNCBPTR)                           1792 03259000
@GL00024 LR    @15,@00                                             1792 03260000
         N     @15,@CF05624                                        1792 03261000
         CS    @00,@15,LDNZF007-3(ICNCBPTR)                        1792 03262000
         BNE   @GL00024                                            1792 03263000
*/************FOLLOWING LINES DELETED BY APAR ************** @ZA26631*/ 03264000
*/*     WKREG=LDNSIOQ                  GET ADDRESS OF FIRST ELEMENT  */ 03265000
*/*                                    ON SIOQ.                      */ 03266000
*/*     RFY                                                          */ 03267000
*/*       REG0 RSTD                                                  */ 03268000
*/*     REG0=0                         ZERO SIOQ POINTER.            */ 03269000
*/* NOSIOQ:                                                  @AS33958*/ 03270000
*/*     CS(WKREG,REG0,LDNSIOQ)                                       */ 03271000
*/*     RFY                                                          */ 03272000
*/*       REG0 UNRSTD                                                */ 03273000
*/*     BC(7,NOSIOQ)                                                 */ 03274000
*/*     IF(WKREG&MASK)¬=0 THEN         IF BUFFER(S) EXISTED ON SIOQ  */ 03275000
*/*       DO                           THEN                          */ 03276000
*/*         CALL FREERTN               FREE THE BUFFER(S) ON SIOQ.   */ 03277000
*/*         LDNZLAST=0                 CLEAR ADDRESS OF LAST BUFFER  */ 03278000
*/*                                    ON THE SIOQ                   */ 03279000
*/*         LDNZATTP=OFF               CLEAR ATTENTION IN PROGRESS   */ 03280000
*/*                                    FLAG.                         */ 03281000
*/*       END                          END BUFFER(S) ON SIOQ.        */ 03282000
*/*     ELSE                                                         */ 03283000
*/*                                    NO BUFFER(S) ON SIOQ.         */ 03284000
*/*                                                                  */ 03285000
*/*     LDNZF003=OFF                   CLEAR RESET AT EOF COMMAND.   */ 03286000
*/*     LDNZV001=0                     CLEAR ADDRESS OF RESET BUFFER.*/ 03287000
*/*     IF ICNCBPTR¬=NCBPTR THEN       IF AN NCB WAS FOUND           */ 03288000
*/*       DO                           THEN                          */ 03289000
*/*         FMCZFA06=OFF               CLEAR THE SESSION FLAGS       */ 03290000
*/*         FMCZFB06=OFF               IN THE DNCB.                  */ 03291000
*/*         FMCZFC06=OFF                                             */ 03292000
*/*         FMCZFD06=OFF                                             */ 03293000
*/*         DNCSESS=OFF                CLR SESSION FLAG IN DNCB.     */ 03294000
*/*       END                          END NCB FOUND.                */ 03295000
*/*     ELSE                                                         */ 03296000
*/*                                    NCB PTR NOT FOUND.            */ 03297000
*/*   END                              END DEVICE IS LOCAL 3270.     */ 03298000
*/* ELSE                                                             */ 03299000
*/*                                    DEVICE NOT LOCAL 3270.        */ 03300000
*/********************************************************** @ZA26631*/ 03301000

./  ADD  SSI=51300307,NAME=ISTZLFV0
         TITLE 'LOCAL FIXED SERVICES VECTOR TABLE                      *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
ISTZLFV0 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00004000
*   END ISTZLFV0;                                                  0003 00005000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00006000
         DS    0F                                                       00007000
         DS    0F                                                       00008000
         DS    0D                                                       00009000
ISTZLFV0 CSECT                                                          00010000
         DC    V(ISTZEFBA)              LOCAL 3270 SHIPOUT              00011000
         DC    V(ISTZEMAA)              LOCAL 3270 I/O INIT             00012000
         DC    V(ISTZFMFA)              LOCAL 3270 I/O SCHEDULER        00013000
         DC    V(ISTZEMTA)              LOCAL TEST SHIPOUT     @XL03HDP 00014000
         DC    V(ISTZFMTA)              LOCAL CEA TEST EXT     @XL03HDP 00015000
         DC    V(ISTZFFXA)              LOCAL SIOQ CLEANUP     @XL03HDP 00016000
         DC    V(ISTZEMFA)              I/O PURGE              @XL03HDP 00017000
         DC    A(0)      VS1 ONLY       DELAYED READ SCHED     @XL03HDP 00018000
         DC    V(ISTZFFEA)              BUFFER ALLOCATION      @XL03HDP 00019000
         DC    V(ISTZEMEA)              VS2 I/O PURGE INTERF   @XL03HDP 00020000
         DC    V(ISTZDFK0)              LOCAL ATTENTION TEST   @XC03HDP 00021000
         DC    A(0)                     RESERVED                        00022000
         DC    A(0)                     RESERVED                        00023000
ISTZLFV0 CSECT                                                          00024000

./  ADD  SSI=51300309,NAME=ISTZPSV0
         TITLE 'PAGEABLE SERVICES VECTOR TABLE                         *00001000
                        '                                               00002000

*   END ISTZPSV0;                                                  0003 00005000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00006000
         DS    0F                                                       00007000
         DS    0F                                                       00008000
         DS    0D                                                       00009000
ISTZPSV0 CSECT                                                          00010000
         DC    V(ISTZDFA0)              LSCB/BUFFER ALLOCATION RTN      00011000
         DC    V(ISTZDFC0)              LCCW MOVE ROUTINE               00012000
         DC    V(ISTZDFD0)              DATA MOVE ROUTINE               00013000
         DC    V(ISTZDFH0)              QUEUE XFER ROUTINE              00014000
         DC    V(ISTZDFB0)              LSCB/BUFFER DE-ALLOC RTN        00015000
         DC    V(ISTZDFI0)              TRANSLATE AND TEST ROUTINE      00016000
         DC    V(ISTZBFY0)              LCCW SYNCH SERVICE ROUTINE      00017000
         DC    V(ISTZBFZ0)              INVALID LCP RECOVERY RTN        00018000
         DC    V(ISTZBFMB)              SINGLE LCCW/LCP ANALYSIS        00019000
         DC    V(ISTZBFOB)              DISCONNECT SCHEDULER            00020000
         DC    A(ISTZTRTT)              LCCW COMMAND TRANSLATE TABLE    00021000
         DC    V(ISTZDFF0)              CPU OP MSG WRITER      @XL03HDP 00022000
         DC    A(0)                     RESERVED               @X50BHWP 00023000
         DC    V(ISTZDFNB)              INTERNAL MSG FORMATTER @XL03HDP 00024000
         DC    V(ISTZDFMF)              ROL PROCESSOR          @ZM10836 00025000
         DC    V(ISTZDMMB)              MDR RECORD PROCESSG    @ZM31473 00026000
         DC    2A(0)                    RESERVED               @ZM10836 00027000
         DC    V(ISTZDFXR)       BSC TO SNA 3270 STATUS XLATOR @XL03HDP 00028000
         DC    V(ISTZDFPR)       FID1 RESPONSE FSB BUILDER     @XL03HDP 00029000
         DC    V(ISTZDFQR)       FID1 RESPONSE FSB BUILDER     @XL03HDP 00030000
*/*                                                                  */ 00031000
*/*                           CONSTANTS                              */ 00032000
*/*                                                                  */ 00033000
*/* THIS TABLE IS USED TO TRANSLATE LCCW OP. CODES INTO OFFSETS IN   */ 00034000
*/* ISTZLBVT.  THIS IS USED TO GET THE ADDRESS OF THE APPROPTIATE    */ 00035000
*/* LCCW PROCESSOR.                                                  */ 00036000
*/*   X'10' - READ          ISTZBFAB,  X'2C' - CONTACT      ISTZBFHB */ 00037000
*/*   X'14' - WRITE         ISTZBFBB,  X'30' - DISCONNECT   ISTZBFIB */ 00038000
*/*   X'18' - WRITE SOH     ISTZBFCB,  X'34' - TEST         ISTZBFJB */ 00039000
*/*   X'1C' - COPY          ISTZBFDB,  DELETED 2 ENTRIES FOR         */ 00040000
*/*   X'20' - WRITE CONTROL ISTZBFEB,  DCR 3651.4 ALSO,     VS3-2254 */ 00041000
*/*   X'24' - RESET         ISTZBFFB,  X'40' - INVALID      ISTZBFX0 */ 00042000
*/*   X'28' - CONTROL       ISTZBFGB,  X'44' - SNA CMND.    ISTZBFID */ 00043000
ISTZTRTT  DS     0F                                                     00044000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'40',X'2C',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40'    /* 00    */  00045000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'24',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'18'    /* 08    */  00046000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'10',X'40'    /* 10    */  00047000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'24',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'20'    /* 18    */  00048000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'30',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40'    /* 20    */  00049000
    DC  X'40',X'1C',X'40',X'24',X'40',X'1C',X'40',X'20'    /* 28    */  00050000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'30',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40'    /* 30    */  00051000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'24',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'20'    /* 38    */  00052000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40'    /* 40    */  00053000
    DC  X'44',X'14',X'10',X'24',X'44',X'14',X'10',X'18'    /* 48    */  00054000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'10',X'40'    /* 50    */  00055000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'24',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'20'    /* 58    */  00056000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40'    /* 60    */  00057000
    DC  X'40',X'1C',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'1C',X'40',X'20'    /* 68    */  00058000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40'    /* 70    */  00059000
    DC  X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'40'    /* 78    */  00060000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40'    /* 80    */  00061000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40',X'40',X'14',X'10',X'18'    /* 88    */  00062000
    DC  X'40',X'14',X'10',X'40',X'40',X'40',X'10',X'40'    /* 90    */  00063000

./  ADD  SSI=51300310,NAME=ISTZRM01

ISTZRM01 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'ISTZRM01  75.130'                                 0001 00008000

@PROLOG  BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00012000
*                                                                  0303 00013000

*   /*                                                               */ 00015000

*                                                                  0304 00019000
*   WKAREAPT=GPR00P;                /* WORK AREA PTR PASSED TO     0304 00020000

         LR    WKAREAPT,GPR00P                                     0304 00022000
*   SDWAPTR=GPR01P;                 /* SDWA(RTCA) WORK AREA          */ 00023000

*   SDWAURAL=24;                                                   0415 00321000
         MVI   SDWAURAL(SDWAPTR),X'18'                             0415 00322000
*   DO;                             /* SETRP RECORD(YES)WKAREA(SDWAPT   00323000
*                                      R)RC(0)                       */ 00324000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0417 00325000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0417 00326000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0417 00327000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0417 00328000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              0417 00329000
*     GPR01P=SDWAPTR;                                              0418 00330000
         LR    GPR01P,SDWAPTR                                      0418 00331000
*     GPR01P->SDWARCDE=0;           /* SAVE RC VALUE                 */ 00332000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'00'                              0419 00333000
*     GPR01P->SDWARCRD='1'B;        /* TURN ON RECORD INDICATOR      */ 00334000
         OI    SDWARCRD(GPR01P),B'10000000'                        0420 00335000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0421 00336000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0421 00337000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0421 00338000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0421 00339000
*       GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                            0421 00340000
*   END;                            /* INIT TO PERCOLATE             */ 00341000
*   GEN REFS(GPR06P,GPR07P,PSACSTK,PSA,FRRSCURR,FRRS,FRRSEMP,FRRSELEN)  00342000
*       SETS(GPR06P,GPR07P,FRRSCURR);                              0423 00343000
         SETFRR D,WRKREGS=(GPR06P,GPR07P) DELETE ISTAPM69 FRR ENTRY     00344000
*   RTNREG=REG14SV;                                                0424 00345000
         L     RTNREG,REG14SV(,WKAREAPT)                           0424 00346000
*   RETURN;                                                        0425 00347000
*                                                                  0425 00348000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0425 00349000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0425 00350000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0425 00351000
*/* TPEPILOG                                                         */ 00352000
*                                                                  0426 00353000
*   GEN(PRINT OFF);                                                0426 00354000
         PRINT OFF                                                      00355000
*   GEN(PRINT ON);                                                 0427 00356000
*                                                                  0427 00357000

*/* END OF TPEPILOG                                                  */ 00359000

         B     @EL00001                                            0428 00374000
